posts.postContent:
Synopsis The Berserker's Second Playthrough

The protagonist, having possessed a berserker character within the game, has finally slain the Great Demon and cleared the ending after many events.

He believed that was the end.

However, before his eyes was not an exit to the real world but a [New Game+] button to start another run.

Synopsis World-Saving is a Skill

[By the Studio that brought you {The Return of the Crazy Demon and Absolute Regression and Surviving as a Genius on Borrowed Time and many more}!



I saved another world... only to find Earth in an even bigger mess.

However, there's no need to worry. A guy who saved the world once can do it again.

[By the Studio that brought you <Jungle Juice and many more>

Kim Sang-an is a cold-blooded loan shark.

When his younger sister, a schoolteacher, takes her own life after relentless bullying from her students, he becomes the homeroom teacher of those very students to collect the price of her life.

A merciless loan shark who will collect his debts even if it means descending into hell and a class of devil-like students...

A vicious, twisted teacher-student relationship.

posts.postTitle: Paying Respects To The Sect Leader
posts.postContent:
After dying in an accident, Chu Xiu discovers that he has transmigrated into the game world “The Great Jianghu.” Even more shocking, he has become a yet-to-grow BOSS from the game—the Kunlun Sect Leader!

Given a second chance at life, will Chu Xiu walk the predetermined path of a doomed BOSS once again, or will he rewrite fate and create a new martial world legend where demonic flames soar across the jianghu?

Su Xiao was dragged into a rule-bound horror challenge where survival depended on obedience. No one expected anything from him—until he shattered every expectation by pulling an SSS-rank talent right from the start. From that moment on, the game stopped being about fear. His actions were ruthless, decisive, and completely unrestrained. Whatever the rules forbade, he did without hesitation, defying the system at every turn. When the grotesque entities finally revealed themselves, Su Xiao didn’t scream or run—he struck first, slapping them so hard they began to doubt their own existence, then forcing them into submission... In a game designed to terrify its participants, Su Xiao became the one thing the horrors themselves feared.

Ye Mo was a peerless genius of the Moonfall Continent, a cultivator who spent countless years waging war against the Demon Race. When victory was finally within reach and the continent was saved, he was betrayed by the very companions who had fought beside him — and slain.

Yet death was not the end.

Ye Mo awakened in another world, reborn into the body of his alternate self. With his cultivation, memories, and hatred intact, the strongest cultivator begins anew. This time, he will return to Moonfall — and those who betrayed him will be dragged, screaming, into the depths of hell.

posts.postTitle: I am the God of Wealth in the Three Realms
posts.postContent: Lin Yuan unexpectedly inherits the divine title of God of Wealth across the Three Realms, only to face a crisis of diminishing powers due to his reckless extravagance. Humiliating his ex-girlfriend, taking down village tyrants, and rising to become the richest man on Earth are merely the beginning—soon, he revolutionizes the celestial economy by launching “Immortal Pill Mystery Boxes” and “Underworld Cultural Tourism” in the Heavenly Court, applying modern business strategies to upend the economic order of the Three Realms. When his actions provoke an ancient malevolent deity and trigger a heavenly trial, Lin Yuan ignites a world-shaking revolution of wealth and power, proving that a true God of Wealth does far more than just spend money—he reshapes the very laws governing Heaven, Earth, and the Underworld.
posts.alternativeTitles: 我在三界当财神

chapters.title: "The Old Man and the Beginning of Revenge"

posts.postTitle: The Unluckiest Man Became the Universe’s Most Evil Mage and Wants to Be Rewarded
posts.postContent: I lived my life honestly, doing my best to help others. But instead of being rewarded, my life was a constant cycle of misfortune and unfair misunderstandings... After a tragic death, I, Kuroda Issei, was told a shocking truth as a soul. Due to a system error, my good deeds were inverted; the harder I worked, the more "unbeatable negative karma" I accumulated. To avoid Hell, I was reincarnated into the body of the "Black Mage," a figure feared throughout a magical world. Even worse, my new ability is a cruel irony, I can only gain luck by performing "good deeds." Despite looking like the ultimate villain, I face a paradox,I must do "good" just to survive. Determined to find my mother and return to Earth, I enlist the help of a female mage to lead the forces of evil and begin a grand reversal of fate. The curtain rises on an "Anti-Hero" fantasy where a man burdened with the worst karma must save the world!
posts.alternativeTitles: ツイてない俺は宇宙一極悪な魔導士になってしまったけど報われたい
posts.author: JEFFON/KYUMELLY

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Level 0 Unrivaled With Analysis Skills
posts.postContent:
The world shattered in an instant. "Disaster Beasts" emerged from the shadows, dragging humanity to the very brink of extinction. Itsuki Tenma, a survivor who watched these monsters slaughter his parents, is chosen as an "Awakener"—humanity's last line of defense.

But fate seems to play a cruel joke: his awakened rank is the absolute bottom... Level 0.

Or so they thought.

Itsuki’s "useless" rank hides a logic-defying Rare Class! Armed with a cheat-tier ability to analyze enemy skills and infinitely boost his own stats, he breaks the system wide open.

From the weakest failure to a god-tier avenger, Itsuki begins his relentless climb. Fueled by rage and armed with broken powers, the road to becoming Humanity’s Strongest starts now.

Red Cloud Mountain Range, the close-quarters border between the Demonic Race and the Federation of Heterogeneous Races. It is the final strategic stronghold, where training and real combat proceed simultaneously.

The Federation Army searches for the ten Transcendents revealed in the Book of Prophecy, repeating cycles of conscription and selection in order to reclaim its stolen territory.

But more terrifying than the war against the Demonic Race were the absurdities of military life and its brutal abuse.

Gao Jue, suffering from a terminal illness, unexpectedly awakens an extraordinary sense of smell—and with this supernatural ability, he repeatedly cracks baffling cases. When everyone concludes a death is suicide, he sniffs out the real culprit behind an insurance fraud; when a crime scene bears no visible traces, he detects the lethal scent left behind by the murderer. Yet as all clues converge on the unsolved “Yujing Road Case”—the mysterious disappearance of his father six years prior—a clandestine transnational criminal organization lurking in the shadows begins to emerge…

posts.postTitle: A Wimp’s Strategy Guide To Conquer The Tower
posts.postContent: One day, mysterious black towers rose up all across the Earth, and the awakening of a very small number of humans began. But it was something completely unrelated to Bong Juhyeok—a timid, cowardly weak man. Today again, after exhausting himself at part-time jobs, he was just about to put a bite of ramen into his worn-out body when… [Bong Juhyeok, You've awakened.] “…What the—f*, that scared me!” Could this really be the chance to turn his life around?!

Chen Shi, a descendant of Zheng He’s fleet, was born with a divine embryo that was stolen from him. He grew up in hardship, relying only on his Grandpa, Chen Yindu. Cursed with a ghostly hand and fragmented memories, he embarks on a path of cultivation to uncover the truth. As turmoil erupts in the Ghost God Realm and gods and spirits wage war, he is swept into conflicts among noble families, martial sects, and the imperial court, even crossing paths with the formidable Jinyiwei, all while holding fast to his true nature. In the end, he unravels the world's deepest secrets, uncovers the mystery of his origins, confronts a world-ending crisis, and forges his own legendary path.
posts.alternativeTitles: 大道之上
posts.author: 桔子文化

posts.postTitle: High Martiality: With One Hand, I Single-Handedly Repel Three Thousand Emperors!
posts.postContent:
The Martial Way is undergoing a great resurgence — yet chaos reigns.

Ferocious Beasts run rampant, and countless alien races invade, vying with humanity for dominance in this new era of strife. Amidst the turmoil, the young Su Hong awakens a mysterious system — and with it, a talent unmatched in ten thousand years.

  • C-rank martial arts? One second to Entry, two to Proficiency, three to Perfection!

  • SSS-rank martial techniques? One day to Entry, seven to Proficiency, one month to Great Accomplishment!

But that’s not all — every enemy he defeats grants him Martial Value. By expending Martial Value, he can:

✓ Boost his Qi and Blood,

Dra✓ Strengthen his bones,

✓ Forge a divine physique — step by step, ascending beyond mortal limits. Martial Value –1,000: Qi and Blood enhanced —

Su Hong takes his first stride, stepping into the realm of the Martial Artist!
posts.alternativeTitles: 高武：只手横推三千帝！
posts.author: 漫创堂

posts.postContent: The world as we knew it ended. Radiation covered the world aboveground and turned it into hell. And humanity headed deep into the underground. Using the world’s most developed underground network as its backbone, they built an underground city. The last hope of humanity, the underground city of SHINDORIM. And we, who could not enter the underground city, were left behind in hell. So we had to get strong. And we did.
posts.alternativeTitles: Sindorim Синдорим ชินโดริม 地下城市 新道林 신도림
posts.author: OH Sehyeong

posts.postTitle: Full Actor: Unrivaled Revenge with the Skills I Acquired
posts.postContent: In a "caste (class) society," a person's value is determined by their skill rank. Osamu, a high school student with no special abilities, is scorned as "incompetent" and subjected to brutal bullying by his family and classmates. But one day, driven to the brink of death, he awakens to the power of "Learning," which allows him to steal the skills that have tormented him. Now, all of the oppression he endured every day will be transformed into the power of revenge! Standing in his way is an S-class party known as the nation's heroes. The curtain rises on an unrivaled drama of "skill revenge" that will overturn a society that mocks the weak!
posts.alternativeTitles: フルアクター～無能な俺が喰らったスキルで復讐無双～
posts.author: 富士防人

posts.postContent: Eugene, a vampire, was ultimately killed as a sacrifice for a Paladin's reputation after half a year of life on the run. To him, who ended his life in regret, the opportunity of regression arrived. "I will absolutely not die like that again. If I've truly returned to the past, by any means necessary... I will not regret it a second time."
posts.alternativeTitles: 뱀파이어 로드로 사는 법
posts.author: Kim Hyungjun

posts.postTitle: The Extra Who Returned Became a Genius
posts.postContent:
The story delves into the life of Kim Seon-woo, who got pulled into a famous novel and decided to live a quiet life as a side character.

One day, the protagonist of said novel died…

“…Do you expect me to believe this?”

He ends up regressing back in time – back to his first day within the novel.
posts.alternativeTitles: 회귀한 엑스트라가 천재가 됨
posts.author: 스튜디오 시그마

posts.postTitle: Star Armor: Unleashing My Star Soul And Cleaving Through The Chaos Of The World
posts.postContent:
Qin Li’s soul transmigrated into a chaotic era where five nations fought for supremacy. When he woke up, he found himself captured by barbarians and made into a slave. Fortunately, the card-drawing system bound to him just in time, and he drew Lü Bu right at the start— but not the historical warlord Lü Bu… 

it was Star Soul General Lü Bu! 


Rice crackers, instant noodles, mineral water…  as he drew more and more items… 

Qin Li donned the White Tiger Battle Armor, rode a Tiger-Shark motorcycle, and piloted the gigantic Star Soul General, slaughtering millions on the battlefield like it was nothing… 


Qin Li: “I won’t pretend anymore. The truth is—I’m the disciple of an immortal. The Great Mobility Immortal's power is limitless!”
posts.alternativeTitles: 星甲：我开星魂将杀穿乱世
posts.author: Lexiang Animation

posts.postContent:
— The Story Before

Sokcho, Gangwon Province.

There was a group of young men who organized a merchants' union to stand their ground against local thugs, protecting their livelihoods with their own hands.

But after endless violence, the world branded them as gangsters too, leaving them with no way out and no future ahead.

That was when Tae-cheol, their leader, made a decision.

"If we're going down this road, let's go to Seoul and become the real kings of the underworld."

Kwon Taesu, Kim Mingyu, and others who shared his ambition answered the call, and together, they set off for the massive concrete jungle of Seoul.

This is the story of their youth... men who staked their lives and fought tooth and nail to survive in an unfamiliar, ruthless world.

— A chronicle of their desperate struggle.
posts.alternativeTitles: 블러드레인 제로
posts.author: 민(Meen)

posts.postTitle: The Demon King Overrun by Heroes
posts.postContent:
After diligently following the “demon king’s standards,” I ended up getting killed by the heroes.

What, my tower and I are a custom-made hunting ground for heroes now?

With this chance at life regained through regression, to hell with the damn demon king’s standards!

This is the story of surviving as the hard-headed(?) demon king, Berze!
posts.alternativeTitles: 마왕인데 용사가 너무 많음
posts.author: MIDNIGHT STUDIO

posts.postContent:
The reincarnation of the world's strongest men, their ordinary lives are already over. Cheonma stands on the verge of unifying the world. 

After a decisive battle with their arch-enemy, the Ice Witch, the two die together and are reincarnated into the human world as ordinary twin siblings. 

But peace is short-lived. Now in their teens, reincarnated organizations are shaking the world. The world will not spare these siblings, who try to live while hiding their past powers. 

Former subordinates gather, one by one. This time, the Ice Witch protects them as a partner, not as enemies. Can Cheonma truly become the world's strongest again?!
posts.alternativeTitles: 데블&아이스
posts.author: 다넛

posts.postContent:
After dying in an unforeseen accident, Kim Yohan is reincarnated as Johan Aitz of the Aitz family. Although born a noble, Johan Aitz ranks dead last within his own household. To make matters worse, this world is a brutal medieval realm. 

“The only one you can trust is yourself.” 

To survive in this law-of-the-jungle world, money and strength are essential! 

To survive in this law-of-the-jungle world, money and strength are essential! While accumulating training time based on the knowledge from his former modern life, Johan encounters Kaegal, the Master of Deadly Poison from the Empire’s greatest assassin group, the Nesos Guild... 

This is the story of Johan’s desperate struggle to avoid becoming prey in this era.
posts.alternativeTitles: 방랑기사로 살아가는 법
posts.author: Redice Studios

posts.postContent:
After nearly a century of war against the demons, humanity finally seized victory—but it came at the cost of countless lives. Zavier, humanity's last warrior, breathed his final breath filled with regret for failing to save his comrades and burning hatred for the Demon King—or so it should have been.

However, when he opened his eyes, the very scene of his birth lay before him! Blessed with a talent for magic he never possessed in his previous life, Zavier vows to become a Magic Swordsman, gain true strength, and exact his revenge this time around.

One day, while training in secret, a twist of fate causes Zavier to fall into the legendary "Abyss." Waiting for him there was the World Tree, plagued by a mysterious disease, and the Goddess who guards its roots. Can he unravel the truth of the world and protect those he holds dear from the demons? The battle for humanity's future begins now!
posts.alternativeTitles: 回帰した天才魔剣士
posts.author: Ailu.cat, tsuzume, forlen

posts.postContent:
An era where everyone could possess internal energy. While the existence of martial masters are still quite meaningless, in the current world, martial masters with exceptional abilities are being created through ancient books and systematic research.

There are other ancient books that world knows about other than internal energy cultivation methods. Because of the secret martial art manuals that were stolen and hidden away, terrifying monsters were created from it. There was a commotion in the world as they had deviated from the norms and established an organization under the pretext of a martial art sect to grow their power. They are also going all out in taking care of dark clean ups that are supported by huge fundings.
posts.alternativeTitles: 장풍전
posts.author: Shin Young-woo

posts.postTitle: The Player Of A Fallen Noble Family
posts.postContent:
Riyun, the youngest son of the prestigious House of Sermin of the Drea Continent.

The once-peaceful family began walking the path of ruin after the disappearance of both the Lord and heirs of the house.

And at the very moment when everything collapsed,

Riyun was captured by House Paton and, after being tortured repeatedly met his end.

However, when he opened his eyes, the place he found himself in was not reality, but Adeon — an endless battlefield and the playground of the gods.

In that place, where countless "Players" lose their lives, Riyun grew to become the "Ghost King", a Master Player who had mastered all classes {Assassin, Necromancer, and Ghost}, and had the ability to challenge the gods.

Though he met death once more in defeat,

his story did not end there.

When he awakened again,

he found himself in his childhood as a twelve-year-old who still possesses the power of a player.

To prevent the downfall of his family and reclaim everything he had lost,

He begins turning reality itself into his game board.

His first act: a bloody revenge against the great noble House Paton, the very family who destroyed House Sermin and killed him.
Sharing the lucky koi fish image will lead to your wishes coming true... You'll get everything you want... Even... The ability to control other people's lives and deaths...
posts.alternativeTitles: Hēi Jǐn Lǐ ブラック・ウィッシュ～錦鯉様の言うとおり 黑锦鲤
posts.author: Kujira_

posts.postContent:
Heroes of Gauri, conquer another world!

The most glorious name on this land: Gauri. The one who protected that name—people call him the Steel Emperor! Ko Jin-cheon, the last great general of the fallen Gauri (Goguryeo).

At the moment of defeat, he falls into another world together with his elite unit, the Black Armored Ghost Cavalry A strange land where elves, orcs, dwarves, and mages live. If they cannot return, they must establish a new Gauri. Ko Jin-cheon raises his banner once more to conquer the continent.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Steel Emperor
posts.author: 수리

posts.postTitle: The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees from Another World
posts.postContent: Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world. He was ridiculed as a "failed hero" at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered. However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds! Now Kyouya's unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes!
posts.alternativeTitles: Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha Saikyou no Maou ni Kitaerareta Yuusha, Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musou Suru Saikyō no Maō ni Kitaerareta Yūsha, Isekai Kikansha-tachi no Gakuen de Musō Suru The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King Is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World 最凶の魔王に鍛えられた勇者、異世界帰還者たちの学園で無双する 由最凶恶魔王所锻炼的勇者，在异世界回归者们的学园里所向披靡
posts.author: KONNO Chiaki

posts.postContent: Shuichi was born in modern society as an ordinary high school student. After losing his father, he struggled desperately to protect his mother and sister, but was brutally bullied at school and even lost his life in an unexpected accident. However, when he woke up, he found himself reborn as Lucas Ryan, a noble boy from another world! It seems that Lucas once incurred the wrath of the magic god and died without being granted magic. Shuichi's soul resides in Lucas's body, and at the same time, he receives the blessing of Mars, the god of war! However, in this world, magicians are revered and martial artists are looked down upon. Reborn as Lucas, he would rather not live a life of despise by those around him—that's the last thing he wanted! Shuichi will master martial arts as Lucas and seize glory with his fists.
posts.alternativeTitles: In a world where magic reigns supreme, he became an academy genius, 魔法至上の世界でアカデミーの天才になっていた
posts.author: Tiddler & Bowknots

posts.postContent: Geist is a ruthless and skilled special agent. Having traveled through the shadows of the nation, he lost his life during a top-secret mission due to an enemy plot. Or so he thought, but he wakes up in the form of Sakuraba Keisuke, a high school student in the middle of a fight. He is caught up in a mysterious battle where he streams the fight and earns money based on the outcome. Geist borrows the body of a frail high school student and vows to take revenge on his former enemy. The weakest body houses the strongest mind and technology... A special agent's revenge battle action!
posts.alternativeTitles: その高校生、亡霊（ガイスト）につき
posts.author: Naotoshi Nakajima

posts.postContent: Kurenai is a legendary mercenary who paints the battlefield crimson. Having completed missions on numerous battlefields, he has been given a new mission: to teach at a Japanese high school. He travels to Japan under the name of Echizen Shota and learns the details of his mission: to protect a female student named Kujo Sakurako who attends the school. Having grown up on a battlefield and never having had anything to do with a woman, will he be able to complete this most difficult mission of all?
posts.alternativeTitles: 拳銃教室
posts.author: Ryosuke Haneda

posts.postContent:
“He eats poison three times a day instead of food—and still won’t die?”

An indestructible monk of eternal life, the Diamond Immortal (Geumgang Bulgwe)—no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t die.
At long last, he finally succeeds in dying... 

—or so he thought.
He awakens to find himself reborn as a third-rate bodyguard at a pleasure house in Shandong Province! 

But within him still lies the immense power of his former self… 

As the martial world falls into endless turmoil— with princes scheming for the throne, and the heretical Taoist cult moving in the shadows— one humble bodyguard, Cheongpung, stands against the chaos. 

To make matters worse, enemies from his past life begin to reappear, and the conflict reaches its peak. 

Can he reclaim the martial might of his saintly past— and finally attain true nirvana? 

In 2025, Hwang Seong returns with an epic wuxia saga that will tear the martial world apart!
posts.alternativeTitles: Return Of The Immortal Monk, 성승귀환, Return of the Holy Spirit
posts.author: Imperial City

posts.postTitle: Gintama 3rd Year Class Z Ginpachi Sensei Tuuuunnn!!
posts.postContent: It's been made into a novel! An anime! And, something no one expected, it's now been made into a vertical manga! With his sloppy white coat and dead fish-like eyes, Sakata Ginpachi has a personality and appearance that are hardly befitting of a high school teacher. His homeroom class, Class 3-Z of Gintama High School, is crammed with students with equally strong personalities, turning it into a terrifying amusement park. Is there really a future for such a problematic class?! into a novel! An anime! And, something no one expected, it's now been made into a vertical manga! With his sloppy white coat and dead fish-like eyes, Sakata Ginpachi has a personality and appearance that are hardly befitting of a high school teacher. His homeroom class, Class 3-Z of Gintama High School, is crammed with students with equally strong personalities, turning it into a terrifying amusement park. Is there really a future for such a problematic class?!s
posts.author: Yuki Aonuma, Ao Suzumura, Hideaki Sorachi, Tomohito Osaki

posts.postContent:
Hanseong, a SSS-class monster hunter from Earth, was summoned to another world and forced to dedicate his life to serving as the Empire's hunting dog.
He lost his life in a quest to save the land, and was reincarnated as Dale, the eldest son of the Saxon Dukes. 

As the son of the "Black Duke," the continent's greatest dark magician and the apex ruler of the Black Tower, he vowed to "destroy the Empire with his own hands."

Swords, magic, and necromancy.
Drawing on the knowledge and abilities of his past life, Dale is reborn as the Duke's prodigy. Where does his talent lead? His unstoppable march begins now!
posts.alternativeTitles: 공작가의 역대급 신동 • Legendary Prodigy Of The Duke • The Unprecedented Prodigy of the Duke’s House • O Prodígio Lendário do Ducado

posts.postContent: Lee Shin runs a shaman-for-hire agency that’ll fix any problem — for the right price. He needs ten billion won to save his younger sister, but no matter how hard he tries, he can’t find a way to raise the money. Then Ji-yul, a zealous proselytizer, approaches him on the street with a flattering line — “You have such a kind-looking face.” A brilliant, reckless plan forms: Lee will pose as the leader of her cult, the Bright Heaven Cult, and swindle the entire ten billion won for himself.
posts.alternativeTitles: เรียกฉันว่าพระเจ้า 신이 되겠다
posts.author: Jeong Yeon Ho

posts.postContent: Qin Yong and his entire class are transported to another world after an earthquake. He obtains the Strongest Devouring System—but ends up becoming the weakest spirit beast! Together with his rival, the campus belle , Qin Yong roams the Spirit Taming Continent only to discover that the entire world is actually a conspiracy planned by the Planer God...
posts.alternativeTitles: Evolve, Tin Chrysalis! Evolve, Tin Pupa! Jìnhuà Ba, Tiěpí Yǒng! Please Evolute, Galvanized Iron Pupa! Tiến Hóa Đi Caterpie 異世界転生～人間辞めました～ 进化吧，铁皮蛹！
posts.author: 爱豆喵漫画

posts.postContent: Roland, the world's strongest swordsman, spends his days fighting to defeat the Demon King. His emotional support is his beloved girlfriend, Felicia. However, due to the Demon King's curse, she is transformed into a monster. Felicia loses her sense of self and attacks Roland. In despair, Roland fights her, and the two die together. As his consciousness fades, Roland hears a voice: "You must not die here..." And then Roland is revived. In place of the arm he lost in the battle, he obtains the arm of Felicia, who has turned into a monster. This dark fantasy begins, in which he seeks revenge with the arm of his beloved.
posts.alternativeTitles: 世界を救う魔物の腕
posts.author: TOON CRACKER

posts.postTitle: Transmigrated as a Barbarian! Conquering Another World Starting from a Defeated Battle
posts.postContent:
Transmigrated into a low-tech barbarian tribe!?

In this story of rising to power, the protagonist is reincarnated as the chieftain of a defeated barbarian tribe, subjugated by a powerful empire. With their tribe on the verge of collapse after losing a war, the protagonist leads them in a fight to overthrow the empire and reclaim their freedom.

A thrilling tale of ambition, strategy, and survival unfolds as they strive to build up their tribe and challenge the might of the empire!
posts.alternativeTitles: Reborn as a Barbarian! Conquering Another World Starting From a Defeated Battle, 蛮族転生! 負け戦から始まる異世界征服, Banzoku Tensei! Makeikusa Kara Hajimaru Isekai Seifuku
posts.author: MUSASHINO Junpei

posts.postTitle: Golden Core Is A Star You Call This Cultivating Immortality
posts.postContent: Others walk their pets, either spirit creatures or lapdogs, but I, Qi Yuan, walk a kitchen knife. Everyone in the sect thinks I'm insane, but unexpectedly, my eyes can see hidden messages. Having transmigrated to this world of cultivation, I've discovered that all foundation-building techniques transform practitioners into sustenance for a certain entity. So, to build my foundation, I created my own techniques and collected spiritual objects, solely to build the foundation for the Heavenly Dao!
posts.alternativeTitles: 金丹是恒星，你管这叫修仙？
posts.author: Afternoon Comics

posts.postTitle: The Old Man of the Otherworld’s Convenience Store is Actually the Strongest
posts.postContent: Starting today, I'm Land, and I'll be working at 'Powson', Nice to meet you. In a town far from the royal capital Apollonia, there was a 24-hour magic tool shop (convenience store). It was a convenient place for adventurers on expeditions to restock items, potions, and weapons without worrying about the time. Land, a new part-time worker at the magic tool shop 'Pawson' (with an hourly wage of 900 Nils), had only been working there for a week. Unable to memorize the massive manual, he was causing trouble for his younger, more experienced colleagues. His dream was to travel the world leisurely in his old age. However, he was on the verge of being fired from the part-time job that was supposed to help him achieve that dream. Today, he messed up a customer's order again and got scolded by his senior coworker, Rick... But this seemingly incompetent part-timer had a surprising secret... This heartwarming story depicts the interactions between an old man hiding his true identity while working part-time, and his young colleagues at a convenience store in another world.
posts.alternativeTitles: 異世界コンビニのおっさん、実は最強。, Isekai Konbini no Ossan, Jitsu wa Saikyou
posts.author: MIKI Kazuma

posts.postContent: In 2035, amidst the highly advanced AI of the modern era, unemployment rate soared to 40%. From this crisis emerged “GOLDGAME,” a virtual game designed for the entertainment of the elite. By staking their lives, players could win immense fortunes and transform their lives. Chen Mo, an unemployed AI researcher, repeatedly survived inside the deadly game just to find his sister who vanished inside the game—ultimately evolving into a god.
posts.alternativeTitles: 成为二进制里的神
posts.author: Yeyue Culture

posts.postTitle: The Last Rebel The Savior Android Changes The Future By Leveling Up
posts.postContent:
In the year 2025, aliens invaded Earth, their arrival heralded by a passing comet. To counter the sudden invasion, humanity develops the anti-alien weapon "Artificial Humans," but they were ultimately annihilated—

Time flows onward. In a desolate world long after humanity's extinction, an Artificial Human named Rihito lived in solitude. His lonely existence being alone suddenly changed when Seina, a high school girl from the past, accidentally time-slips to his era, and the two embark on a journey together.

By defeating aliens, Rihito was able to level up, displaying astonishing power. As the two of them grow closer to each other, they struggle to change the future of humanity's extinction. However, in the midst of their fight, Seina is confronted by a terrible possibility.

—If she changes the future, Rihito might cease to exist.

A sci-fi fantasy about two people from across time weaving their own destiny!
posts.alternativeTitles: 最後の反逆者　救星の人造人間がレベルアップで未来を変える
posts.author: MUGEN FACTORY

posts.postContent: Zhuang Xiaoran, possessed by a mysterious creature in a car accident, awakens to another world full of demon spirits. In her desperate time, a teenager appeared to bring her back to life. Xiaoran learned from him that there have always been demons in this world. In order to take out the demon spirit in her body, she was forced to open a cohabitation life with the teenager, and set foot on the road of no return with him to catch the demon...
posts.alternativeTitles: Da Xiang Wuxing Daxiang Wuxing DaXiangWuXing (Taoist) Fuerza sin forma Taoist: Ghost Hunter Đại Tượng Vô Hình นัยน์ตาพิฆาตมาร 大象无形 大象无形（大道无名） 대상무형: 운명을 삼킨 퇴마사
posts.author: Fan Qi Dongman

Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)

posts.postContent:
The world’s last blacksmith and master craftsman, Kang Hyun-soo. 

After a fire in his forge, his hands were damaged, making it impossible to create anything… 

At this moment, the virtual reality game Ares comes to him. 

[This is an irreparable artifact.] 

[Cannot be crafted due to level restrictions.] 

“Wait? I can call myself a manual blacksmith, though?” 

No system restrictions apply to him. 

Thus begins the turbulent journey of the genius blacksmith’s game.
posts.alternativeTitles: 천재 대장장이의 게임
posts.author: Yes Works

posts.postContent:
Classic cultivation: 

If I want it, the heavens shall have it; 

If I don’t want it, the heavens cannot allow it! 

This is a story that begins between the Eighth Mountain and the Ninth Mountain, a world where “My life as a demon shall seal the heavens”. 

This is Er Gen’s third full-length novel, following <<Renegade Immortal>> and <<Beseech the Devil>>: <<I Shall Seal the Heavens>>.
posts.alternativeTitles: 我欲封天
posts.author: Er Gen

posts.postTitle: The Guiding Adventurer: The Shortest Route to Becoming the Strongest
posts.alternativeTitles: 導きの冒険者 最短ルートで最強行き
posts.author: Yohei Imoto

posts.postContent:
A tragic end to a promising football career sent him back ten years in time. Now, he's been given the ultimate second chance.

Armed with perfect knowledge of the future, he knows which players will become living legends. His new mission is scouting every hidden gems and building an unbeatable team from the ground up.

In this high-stakes sports drama, the real game isn't played on the pitch it's in the back, where the battle to sign the next superstar is more ruthless than any final match.
posts.alternativeTitles: 꿈의 엔트리
posts.author: Wolly

posts.postContent:
The most original union in history—human and ogre blood combined! 

Leon, a half-blood born of human and ogre, returns to the world only to face humanity's hatred and betrayal. Leon despises such humans and vows revenge. 

A stroke of luck finds Leon, who was always powerless and constantly victimized, granting him the chance to exact vengeance upon mankind.
posts.alternativeTitles: 하프블러드
posts.author: Kim Jeong-ryul, Ban-gyo

posts.postContent:
The legendary existence who sought to bring bloodshed upon the Murim, the Demon God, Jeong Cheon.

Even his name alone made the murim tremble in fear, and his sword split the heavens apart. The elite warriors of the Nine Great Sects, not one of them could stand as his match.

His martial prowess that shook all under heaven was passed down like a myth, but in the end, he met death in a way no one had foreseen.

The Jianghu briefly regained peace,and the story of the Demon god seemed buried in legend.

“But fate did not let him go.”

The Demon God, Jeong Cheon astonishingly returned to life. Yet this time, not as the great martial hero of his past life, but in the body of the heir of a fallen noble clan, a frail young master tormented by madness.

The soul that once commanded all beneath the heavens was now trapped inside a weak body, wracked with endless suffering.

The downfall of his clan, the scorn of those around him, and the creeping shadow of insanity consuming his mind, all of these now weighed heavily upon his new life.
posts.alternativeTitles: 신마 환생, Shinma Reincarnation
posts.author: Double D,

posts.postContent:
Noeul, who wants to show off his talent to the world,

Dabin, who throws a ball to become a useful person, meet as a team!

The story of the struggles of the Daejang High School baseball team as they aim to win the national championship!
posts.alternativeTitles: 9局下半NOT OVER, ノットオーバー, 낫오버
posts.author: Doll Seok

posts.postContent:
Saving the Future by Traveling to the Past! 

Lansen, the last prince of the Banroa Kingdom, which was destroyed by the Empire’s invasion. 

He departs to a distant foreign land with the children of his retainers, and through his efforts to survive, he becomes a Sword Master at a young age. 

However, a mysterious events causes him to lose his power, and those around him fall into danger… 

To survive, he uses an ancient relic to travel 10,000 years into the past, and with the opportunities he gains there, he returns to the present to overcome the crisis. 

Yet the threats keep repeating, forcing the protagonist to repeatedly travel through time. 

Amidst it all, astonishing secrets connected to the present begin to unravel, one by one.
posts.alternativeTitles: Sword Master Who Leapt Through Time, 시간을 달리는 소드마스터
posts.author: Today Too

posts.postTitle: Once I Possess The System I Will Become The Creator
posts.postContent: Kano Hoki, an ordinary office worker working as a game planner, is fired from his company after his proposal for a new title is rejected. While he is dejectedly reporting the results to his online friends, the words "Final Chapter" suddenly appear on the monitor, along with a horde of monsters—a scene that is just like the game he himself planned! Shocked, Hoki rushes home to check on his parents and sister, only to find that they are already dead. Enraged, he challenges the monsters, only to be stabbed to death. Feeling guilty that the game he created destroyed the world, and wishing for an afterlife, he loses consciousness. However, when he wakes up, he finds himself in a schoolyard. The world is very different from the one he knows, but Hoki has a chance to start over. A countdown to the end hangs in the sky, with 190 days remaining. Will Hoki, now the "Creator," be able to prevent the apocalypse this time?
posts.alternativeTitles: システムを手に入れた俺は創世主となる
posts.author: Red Stone

posts.postTitle: The Divine Sword of the Demonic Path
posts.postContent:
“I want to become like Uncle, A Great Swordsman! To cultivate strength and help those who are powerless!

Born with the secret techniques of a forbidden unorthodox sect, the child Jang Seol becomes the disciple of Hwangbo Cheol-seung, former sword, a close aide of the Murim Alliance Leader, and begins to take his first steps as a martial artist.

He possesses one special ability…

“This child can read the memories of iron.”

Jang Seol grows stronger each time a weapon passes through his hands.

He throws himself into the chaotic Jianghu to search for the legendary ‘Ten Great Martial Records,’ a legend of the Jianghu!
posts.alternativeTitles: 魔道神劍, 마도신검
posts.author: Lee Hoon-Young

posts.postTitle: The Tale Of The Skeleton Messenger
posts.postContent:
120 years after the Emperor's death, the Emperor's messenger and a Former member of the hero's party, Benrira, awakens. Having lost her beloved student to the corrupt fatherland, she decides to deliver the Emperor's final message.

"I am the messenger who delivers the Emperor's words. Heed the will of the First Emperor!"
posts.alternativeTitles: 해골전령 이야기
posts.author: Kain_y

posts.postContent:
Bu Eun-seol, a boy who lost his grandfather to an unknown assassin.

To exact revenge, he devours the Martial Arts of the Ten Gates Demon Path and the bloody realities of battle,and is reborn as the strongest in the Murim.


“I will definitely find you and kill you.”


Now, at the sacred land of all Demons,

a divine demon that will devour the Murim awakens.

posts.postTitle: The Mad Dog of the Ducal House
posts.postContent:
I lived as a leashed dog for years, in this life, 'I will live as a mad one'

I drew my blade for a king consumed by madness, only to meet my end at the hand of my closest friend. And when I opened my eyes again, I was reborn as my friend's youngest grandson.

No more of this "loyal dog" nonsense, I'm throwing it all away. The leash, the loyalty, the fate. This time, I will live exactly the way I want. The debt from my past life is already paid and this life is my chaotic playground.
posts.alternativeTitles: 공작가에는 미친개가 산다
posts.author: Luminara, Panmi Son

autoUnlockLog.message: Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)

posts.postContent: The daughter of a baron, Alice Nanadan, vows to seek revenge against the "Battle Aristocracy," a system of noble ladies that continues to this day alongside the royal family. In this world, titles are not bestowed by bloodline, but rather by military might. Duels between young ladies eventually became known as "dances," a national pastime, and a major entertainment event that garnered vast amounts of money. This year, the royal family will host a special dance to determine the bride of the second prince. Suddenly, Alice, a transfer student from an unknown baronial family, appears among the dances and throws herself into battle against the young ladies who are fighting for the throne, carrying the pride of their respective families. Honor, love, and the crown. The battle between these ladies, with everything on the line, is about to begin.
posts.alternativeTitles: バトルアリストクラシー
posts.author: Hiratori Kou, KONNO Naoki

posts.postTitle: The Goddess of Abundance and the Genius Troublemaker Apostle
posts.postContent:
I broke through the 0.0000001% odds and became an Apostle serving the [God of Abundance].

He’s obviously a god related to agriculture… but my basic skill is decapitation.

Cut off a head, farming, click. Processing crops, click.

Like one of those health supplements that are really good for you, but impossible to explain properly, I’m selling it.
posts.alternativeTitles: 풍요의 여신과 천재 망나니 사도님

posts.postContent:
Once the shame of his family, now a martial arts prodigy with a perfect memory?!

After dying and coming back to life, he has returned to the battlefield. This time, he is really not a fool!
posts.alternativeTitles: 마교전선 비룡십삼대
posts.author: Shingeomil

posts.postTitle: Forced To Become The Heavenly Demon At Swordpoint
posts.postContent: Seo Ji-hoon, a low-ranking civil servant, desired only a peaceful life. Fatally wounded by a malicious assailant, he awakens in a martial arts world. Hoping to live quietly, he's confronted by an old man—the Heavenly Demon Cult's leader—holding a blade to his throat: "Choose. Die here or become my disciple." To survive, Seo Ji-hoon reluctantly joins the cult. His competence and wisdom make him an unrivaled talent, but his workload and rank keep rising. Will he ever find the peaceful life he craves as the Heavenly Demon?
