posts.postContent:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?
posts.alternativeTitles: 백작가의 망나니가 되었다 • بچه‌ی به‌دردنخور کنت • คุณชายไม่เอาไหนแห่งตระกูลเคานต์ • Я стал графским ублюдком • อันธพาลแห่งตระกูลเคานต์ • 變成伯爵家的混混 • 伯爵家の暴れん坊になった • 成为伯爵家的废物 • Śmieć z rodziny hrabiego • Ничтожество из графского семейства • Отброс графской семьи • Trash Count • Baekjakgaui Mangnaniga Doeeotda • Baegjaggaui Mangnaniga Doeeossda • I Became the Countess Fool • Покидьок графської сім’ї • 成为伯爵家的混混 • Trash of the Count's Family • La basura de la familia del Conde • La Canaille du Comté • The Lout of the count's family • بچهی بهدردنخور کنت • Je suis devenu la honte de la maison du comte • Quel bifolco di un conte • Um lixo de conde • Pembuat onar di keluarga count • Der gräfliche Bengel • Kẻ vô lại nhà bá tước • The Lout of the Count's Family • La basura de la familia del conde • Phế vật dòng dõi bá tước • La canaille du comté • O lixo da família do conde • Je suis devenu le voyou de la famille du comte • La basura de la familia del Conde • بچهی بهدردنخور کنت • The Lout of the count's family
posts.author: Yu Ryeo Han (유려한), PING (별나래)

posts.postTitle: Memoir of  the God of War
posts.postContent: Breathing does not guarantee everyone’s alive! Dan Sa Yu, a descendant of Goryeo, greatly reprimands the Central District for the sake of his friend whom he treasures the most. He reigns every battle! No one could stop him! Cheonpo Armed Forces. The greatest martial arts of Goryeo! The legend of Cheonpo Armed Forces lives on while the history of the King of War unfolds!
posts.alternativeTitles: 전왕전기 • 戰王傳記 • Chiến Vương Truyền Ký • Мемуары Бога Войны • 戦王伝記 • Jeonwangjeongi
posts.author: Woo-Gak

posts.postContent:
A boy named Toori, who can only use everyday magic, worked odd jobs at the Adventurers' Guild to support his sick older brother. The only monsters he could defeat were Slimes, and the magic stones he obtained were meager. His days were spent earning just enough to get by while enduring unreasonable treatment from the guild members.

Then, one day, in a cave, he encountered a "talking book." "Don't you want to get your hands on a real magic stone?" Those words would dramatically change Toori's destiny.

—The tale of the "Unrivaled Magic Stone" Everyday Mage begins here!
posts.alternativeTitles: 100の魔石の大賢者
posts.author: Kan Nagatsuki, Ranto Ayamine, Hiro, Uka Nagisa, SORAJIMA, Kisai Entertainment

posts.postContent:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner. A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!
posts.author: Xing Kong (星空社)

posts.postContent: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
posts.alternativeTitles: Solo Farming in the Tower • Coltivo nella Torre • Only I Farm in the Dungeon • Dungeon Farming on My Own • Farming in the Tower Alone • I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon • 나혼자 탑에서 농사 • Cultivando en la torre en solitario • ปลูกผักพิชิตหอคอย • Nahonja Tabeseo Nongsa • Cultivando a solas en la torre • O Único Fazendeiro da Torre • Sole Dungeon Farming • 我独自在高塔种田 • 我獨自在高塔種田 • 俺だけ塔で農家はじめました
posts.author: Lim Hyeong, sdcknight, Lee Ha Kyung

posts.postContent: The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great? The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited. Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.
posts.alternativeTitles: 블랙기업조선 / Corporación negra: Joseon
posts.author: Gukppong, Kim Puluk

posts.postContent: Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death…
posts.alternativeTitles: Reincarnation Heavenly Demon • 환생천마 • Renascimento do Demônio Celestial • Reborn Heavenly Demon • Reincarnated Heavenly Demon • Demonio Celestial de la Reencarnación • Líder de la Alianza • Rebirth of the Heavenly Demon • Rebirth, Heavenly Demon • Reborn Heavenly Demon • Reincarnation of the Heavenly Demon • Renacido como el demonio • 転生天魔 • 還生天魔 • Demonio Celestial de la Reencarnación • Reborn as the Heavenly Demon • Rebirth of the Heavenly Demon • 還生天魔 • Reincarnation of the Heavenly Demon • Renacido como el demonio • Líder de la Alianza • 転生天魔
posts.author: JP, Younghoon Jang

posts.postContent: Joo In-gong was playing the remake of his favorite game, <Knight Saga: RE>, when he suddenly got pulled inside the game. But something is off. In <Knight Saga: RE>, the only playable characters are Roke from the human side and Zephyr from the demon realm. But when he comes to his senses, he finds himself in the body of Shutra, the 9th prince of the Demon Realm, a character that barely exists in the story. Now, stuck in this weird situation, the only powers Joo In-gong has are a mysterious ‘Protagonist Buff’ and the ‘Power of Conquest’. Now, how will he find his way out of this game?
posts.alternativeTitles: 브레이커즈
posts.author: Ttungto

posts.postContent: Since time immemorial, it has been said that there exists a Spirit Realm. Throughout the dynasties, renowned scholars and literati have spoken of it in various ways, and a poem records: “From Qi to Tang, this mountain grew desolate, the Spirit Realm lay silent, seldom visited by man. The Spirit Realm cannot be described, its ghostly craftsmanship is hard to seek.”
posts.alternativeTitles: Spirit Realm Wanderer, 灵境行者, Língjìng Xíngzhě
posts.author: 英之耀

autoUnlockLog.message: Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)

posts.postContent: During the Republican era, a young boy named Qiu Long accidentally consumed a Dragon Fish Transformation elixir, leaving him critically poisoned and on the brink of death. In order to find an antidote, Qiu Long and his Seventh Uncle embark on a journey to search for rare and mystical treasures.

posts.postTitle: Disaster Comes: I Evolve into the Crimson King
posts.postContent: As the apocalyptic red fog engulfs the city, Yan Hao witnesses the tragic deaths of his loved ones and the disappearance of his sister. Driven by revenge and a search for his family, he joins humanity’s last line of defense, yet harbors a most dangerous secret: a power surging within him, shared with the power of otherworldly beasts! In a post-apocalyptic battlefield rife with blood and flesh, he walks the fine line between hero and monster, devouring otherworldly beasts for strength, yet constantly on the verge of losing control! Continuously evolving, he absorbs the beasts’ abilities and takes them for himself! Slaughtering all before revealing his true form, he becomes the Scarlet King!

posts.postTitle: The Eternal Low-Rank Support Mage Teacher Becomes the Strongest Sage
posts.postContent:
Support magic enhances a person’s abilities or weakens their enemies, but because many of its effects can be replicated with items, it is dismissed as inefficient and derided as mere "babysitting magic."

Thor, once a member of the hero’s party, now works as a low-ranked instructor at Velen Magic Academy, teaching this disregarded form of magic. After helping a student named Reina who looks up to him, Thor is abruptly fired.

With no job prospects, Thor takes Reina’s advice and heads to the Neustadt Empire’s capital. There, he is unexpectedly hired as a court mage by Princess Elena. Though Thor doubts his own worth, thinking, "I’m not skilled enough for this," yet his support magic proves to be anything but ordinary.

Furthermore, his students, such as Reina, have been achieving great feats across the land. With the thought, "At the very least, I want to be cool in front of my students," Thor finds the motivation to act and, without even realizing it, begins to shine as the strongest Sage.

posts.postTitle: A Mountain of Corpses, A Sea of Blood
posts.postContent: In a final battle that claimed them both, the mightiest of heroes, “Gelong”, perished alongside the Demon Lord. Five years later, he is reborn—only to awaken in the heart of his enemies’ domain, his soul now inhabiting the frail body of a lowly demon. But an unforeseen power stirs within this feeble vessel, ignited by his very soul: the ancient evolutionary might of the Serpent God. Gelong, a man once renowned for a ferocity that surpassed the demons themselves—what seas of blood will he now ignite with a truly demonic body?

When Lu Jiang Xian dies from cardiac arrest, his soul remnant clings to a shattered bronze mirror, teleporting him to a vast cultivation world. Deep within the danger-filled Dali Mountain, beside the Chimei River, lives a small family whose fate changes forever after they discover the mirror. With Jiang Xian guiding them through the ways of cultivation, an epic cultivation legend unique to the Lee Family begins.
posts.alternativeTitles: 玄鉴仙族
posts.author: 十二时辰 x 赵大云

posts.postContent:
In a world where the mysterious power known as “Emblem Arts” exists, there was a boy named Ban, born with the Asura emblem, a crest feared as the most disastrous in history.
The one and only ability the Asura emblem possessed was that it would inevitably bring about destruction.

One day, a mysterious sorcerer, seeking the power of destruction, attacked Ban.
In that assault, Ban lost those most precious to him and was trapped in an otherworldly dimension completely cut off from the present world.

Sinking into the swamp of despair that fate had laid before him, he longed for death, yet the seething rage within him refused to allow it.

Enduring the long span of 999 years, grinding his blade for revenge, Ban finally awakened the true destructive power hidden within the Asura emblem.
With it, he shattered the otherworldly dimension and returned to the present world.
Hong Do-jin, a gangster. Borrowing the power of a monster, he takes revenge.

autoUnlockLog.message: Unlocked 1 chapter(s)

posts.postTitle: The Weakest Adventurer’s 99th Life: The Fastest Path from Weakest to Strongest
posts.postContent:
A tower called "Babel" suddenly appeared in the capital city. It's a place where you can get rich quick with treasures and rare materials. But it's also a deadly dungeon, filled with traps and vicious monsters waiting to tear adventurers apart.

Many adventurers try to conquer Babel, and Kyoichiro is one of them. But this isn't his first attempt. He has challenged the tower and died over and over again, returning to the past each time. He does it all to save his precious childhood friend and their companions.

"I swear I'll save them... This time for sure."

Save your childhood friend with the ultimate speedrun! The 99th attempt begins now.
posts.author: Sanbon/SYNAPSE HEART

posts.postTitle: Office Worker in the Ice Age Apocalypse
posts.postContent:
On a midsummer day in June, I was working while enduring the stress of my boss’s usual hysterics.

I couldn’t help but notice the status window that suddenly appeared before my eyes, with the word “Zombie” written on it.

But when my boss’s shouting rang out again, I swallowed my urge to quit on the spot and barely held it together as I worked.

That is, until the sudden arrival of the Ice Age.

—Emergency disaster alert: Cold wave warning.

Before my eyes appeared a stretch of perpetual snow and the grotesquely twisted, zombified form of the intern.

“What on earth is going on?”
posts.alternativeTitles: 빙하기 아포칼립스의 회사원
posts.author: Heenari T, Ppirappara

posts.postTitle: I Quit My Job to Become the Genius Court Mage
posts.postContent:
"Anyone who threatens my peace, regardless of who they are, I'll be sure to kill them."

Rose Freyman is a genius girl who became a court magician, an elite profession, at the young age of ten. Being a court magician is a prestigious occupation that everyone admires. However, despite the honor her position carried, she was nothing more than a glorified "corporate slave." Fed up with such a life, she saved enough money to be able to live without having to work ever again and resigned. Thus began her slow life in a remote house on the frontier. During the day, she would take walks while gathering medicinal herbs. At night, she would soak leisurely in the bathtub and sleep soundly in a large bed. Rose's life seemed as if it would be nothing but rosy, having begun what appeared to be an ideal lifestyle.

However——

This is actually the story of a genius magician who, while striving to protect her own peace, ended up leaving behind a legacy of countless legends——
posts.alternativeTitles: 社畜過ぎて仕事を辞めることにした天才宮廷魔術師〜辺境の地でスローライフを夢見るが、不届き者を倒していたら『最果ての魔女』と呼ばれるようになる～
posts.author: Kishimoto Kazuha, Miyoshi Furumachi

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Hero with a Negative Destructive Power
posts.postContent:
It's been decades since monsters flooded the world. Our protagonist enrolled in an academy that trains capable fighters, but he always came dead last in ability tests. It was bad enough that his powers were weak, but he also dragged down his teammates by giving them debuffs that weakened their abilities. He was mocked as "useless" and "dead weight."

One day, while out on an exploration mission, he got sucked into some kind of dimensional rift and vanished without a trace. That's where he met creatures from another world who finally showed him what his abilities were really worth. See, magic is supposed to work by pushing your power outward to attack, but his gift worked the complete opposite way — instead of "output," he had "input." His real strength was absorbing outside forces, something called a "Reverse Magical Circuit."

All those times he'd been weakening his teammates? He'd been accidentally draining their power without even knowing it. Once he figured out what he could really do, everything changed. He started absorbing monster attacks and canceling them out completely, drawing in external energy to make himself stronger, and finally began his journey to become the most powerful hero of all.
posts.alternativeTitles: 破壊力マイナスの最強英雄
posts.author: Nemeton

posts.postTitle: Honestly, This 13th Regression is Getting Tough
posts.postContent:
I no longer intend to save the world. I won't trust my companions anymore. I'll kill anyone who might become an enemy. Even if they're supposed to be my allies. Thirteen regressions. I've saved the world six times, but none of those endings were the "correct answer".

The man who was once a hero has become a monster through endless regressions. The companions he believed in became traitors, and enemies are everywhere. He gave up his humanity to survive. Are all regression stories the same? This man is different.
posts.alternativeTitles: 回帰も13回目となると正直しんどい
posts.author: Sajahon Koon

posts.postTitle: I Owe A Billion Dollars And I am Forced to Become A Worker For An Evil God
posts.postContent: Office worker Zhou Chen transmigrates to a magical city, only to inherit a hundred billion yuan loan left by a dying young man! To make matters worse, the original owner failed to summon the Evil God, and he was forced to sign a contract: work for the Evil God and fulfill the Evil God’s 999 wishes, or face complete annihilation of body and soul! The only glimmer of hope is the talking “God’s Notebook”. Watch how a modern-day “King of Papers” navigates a capitalistic world where the strong are respected, relying on his workplace mindset to frantically work, undergo extreme cultivation, and defy fate! This Evil God’s worker will never give up!

In an age when yokai, spirits, divine beasts, and evil demons coexisted, Seoritae, the greatest yokai hunter of Joseon, defeated the sinister puppeteer Jarigong, who had plunged the world into chaos by creating yokai, and brought about the extinction of these creatures.

Years later, now living under the name "One-Eye Park", a storyteller, he establishes the Divine Grass Garden to raise children born with yokai blood as virtuous beings.

In the present day, as yokai return and a massive conspiracy unfolds, a new war begins to protect the world once again.
posts.alternativeTitles: 서리태
posts.author: yc****

posts.postContent: In an era where there are no books and everyone has to memorise all the mantras and sutras of Buddhism, Taoism, etc. Watch me introduce novels and wuxia to become a Saint and enter in a new era of spiritual cultivation.

Ye Chuan, a mental patient who sees every living being as... a pig.

On the day he received his class, he awakened a life-type profession: Butcher. Disappointed, his teachers and classmates gave up on him, and even his childhood sweetheart walked away.

But the Butcher class gave him bonus damage against pigs, and pigs dealt half damage to him. And since he sees everyone as pigs — that means everyone is fair game.

Armed with his trusty butcher knife, he rises against all odds and becomes a god!
posts.alternativeTitles: 一把杀猪刀，砍翻万界很合理吧？
posts.author: 灰噗_Lp4hbt

posts.postTitle: Tyrant of the Otherworldly Hell: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
posts.postContent: In 2035, a rift in the alien world tore open the world’s defenses, the insects and the Orcs were rampant, and humans relied on “advanced people” to survive. Li Yiben was betrayed by his companions in an alien attack, and awakened the “Sky-supporting Shadow” system when he was dying – his shadow can evolve infinitely! Swallowing ore to strengthen defense, tearing aliens into sharp blades, and even splitting into a shadow army… From insect nests to strange lands, wherever the shadow passes, the enemy’s flesh and blood turn into mud – the revenge of the weak begins with the shadow swallowing everything!

People call those who can draw the Sword of the Heart, 'Heroes'.

Ellen sets off on a journey to become a Hero, but he soon learns the champions he dreamed of being are nothing more than brutal weapons of war.

Will Ellen manage to overcome this reality and become a true Hero?
posts.alternativeTitles: 심검의 용사, Soulblade Warrior, Warrior of the Mind Sword
posts.author: Moon Do-hyun

posts.postContent: At dusk, the yin and yang were divided. When the flesh and blood of the evil god squeezed out from the cracks in the earth, when the flesh and blood like mountains appeared in various places, some people were afraid, some worshiped, and some burned incense and offered sacrifices. Some people tasted it and thought it tasted good. So, the flesh and blood turned into crops, and people greedily harvested and fought for them, and worshipped their ancestors.

After suffering for a long time at the bottom with no talent whatsoever, I met my death.
That was my first life, and the beginning of an endless regression.
posts.author: Kim Moo-Hyun

posts.postContent:
Tokyo, 2019. A massive tornado struck an entire section of the city. Amidst the chaos, figures appeared from the sky like flashes of light to stop the destruction. Their appearance was truly that of angels.

Years pass, and in a world where the existence of angels has become an everyday sight, the protagonist, Tsubusaki, learns a shocking truth. In order to save his friend, Hajime, he throws himself into danger, triggering an unforeseen explosion.

"Unleash my power."

On the brink of death, what is it that Tsubusaki will obtain?
posts.author: 小秋徹 ／ SHINE Partners

posts.postContent: A man who once dominated the martial world with nothing but his fists, Dan Wooseong. Struck down unexpectedly by a demonic cultist, he opens his eyes again… In the body of the wealthy heir to the Galaxy Merchant Guild. “I don’t wish to be free of debts and grudges. If I’ve been shown grace, I’ll repay it. And if there’s a grudge… I’ll settle it.” All he has now is wealth, but with overwhelming financial power and the martial arts of his past life, he sets out once more… on a path of revenge.
posts.alternativeTitles: 권왕환생
posts.author: Seungtu

posts.postContent:
Shuji, a soldier who danced with death many times while on the battlefield, was possessed by the grudges and resentment of those he had killed. He too was eventually killed, but somehow he awoke in a younger version of himself.

He returned to a time when he was still an errand boy, inexperienced with war, but retained his memories. Remembering Kyo Aiyo, his comrade and savior, Shuji travelled to the ‘Tiger Pit’ Sect. However, instead of the strong and reliable woman, he was met with a cheerful and petite girl. He recalled the tragic past that had caused her to devote herself to the army, where in his previous life her family had fallen apart due to false rumors.

‘This time, I will protect you.’

He vowed to repay the kindness he received in his previous life by changing her fate. With a spear in his right hand, Shuji steps into the battlefield once again, becoming the Unrivaled Spear Demon.
posts.alternativeTitles: n
posts.author: S.J

posts.postContent: This story revolves around a manhua artist renowned for his delays in uploading chapters and his frequent breaks. But suddenly, he is transported into the world of his own manhua, (Yu Ling Shi), after a mysterious phone call, inhabiting the body of “Wang Xiao Ming,”a mere insignificant side character… But how can the manhua’s creator be content with being just a useless secondary character? Can he, as the author, alter his inevitable fate and uncover the many new secrets and hidden elements that the world and the ‘Will of Heaven’ introduced into his work without his knowledge? This is what we will see in the upcoming chapters of this manhua.

In a dangerous world teeming with monsters at every turn, the kingdoms placed their hopes in the System Users, powerful adventurers who grew stronger faster than anyone else. Among them was Novis, one of the most righteous of all. But when a quest goes horribly wrong, Novis’s system becomes infected... and his first new quest is a thirst for blood. The world isn't as simple as Novis once believed. The line between monsters and humans begins to blur, because Novis is no longer just a man. He’s a vampire... a vampire wielding the kingdom’s most powerful system.
posts.author: JKSManga

posts.postContent: A mysterious death case suddenly occurs in Tentoku City. The key to the case lies in a mysterious drug called "Faust". As detective Subaru Shizuhara and police officer Sumire Natsuno solve the case, they learn that everything is in preparation for a certain demon to descend upon this world. And Sumire realizes another terrifying fact: a demon also lurks within her partner, Subaru...

posts.postTitle: Is the reincarnated Demon Lord my childhood friend?
posts.postContent: 17-year-old Kaito has someone he can never forget—his first love, Haruka. Haruka passed away when they were children, and ever since then, Kaito has lived his life without falling in love again. One day, he hears someone calling his name. Drawn by the mysterious voice, he finds himself entering a bookstore. The moment he picks up a certain “book,” Kaito is suddenly transported to another world. And waiting for him there is... a little demon lord who looks exactly like Haruka!? 77
posts.alternativeTitles: 転生魔王は私の幼馴染ですか?
posts.author: SAIKI Shiro

posts.postTitle: Lord of Summoning When the World Changes
posts.postContent: The end of the world arrived, and monsters from the game broke through the dimensional wall slaughtering people wantonly, and the human civilization of Blue Star became on the verge of destruction. At the last moment of the world’s collapse, his time regressed to the beginning of the game. This time he is determined to find out the mastermind behind the scenes, protect his homeland, and never let the tragedy happen again. Thus, a revenge game that races against time begins…

posts.postTitle: The Youngest Son of the Eunhae Merchant Group
posts.postContent:
Eun Seoho was born with the world's greatest merchant talent.
"Why would the Murim Alliance target me...?"
"The higher-ups in the Alliance said you were getting on their nerves. Tsk, what's so special about that damn money."
I was murdered by the blade of the Murim Alliance, who claimed to represent the righteous martial world, and returned to the day I first began learning the trading business. I make a firm resolution:
In this life, I will never have regrets...
"I'll bring you down with the very 'money' you disdain so much."
With his genius intellect and exceptional martial arts talent, the journey of Eun Seoho begins—destined to become a great merchant emperor (商皇) who will go down in history!
posts.alternativeTitles: 은해상단 막내아들
posts.author: Choi Jung-hwan, Shin Seo-ram, Hyang-ran

posts.postTitle: After Transmigrating into the Cyberpunk Game, I Defeated the BOSS and Successfully Rose to the Top
posts.postContent:
After transmigrating into a cyberpunk world, she defeated the BOSS and rose to the top.

Kui Xin was one of the lucky few to be selected to become a beta tester for an upcoming game, 'Crimson Earth'. A futuristic game with a mix of cyberpunk and lovecraft elements.

However, things soon took a wild turn after she realised she got transported into a parallel world where hyper intelligent AI monitors everyone's movement while playing the virtual game.

Supernatural beings, Cyborgs, Secret Cults, and Abnormal humans took the spotlight in this new world.
posts.alternativeTitles: 穿进赛博游戏后干掉BOSS成功上位
posts.author: Eucalyptus

posts.postContent:
Just after retiring from the military, Gendo Shugo finds himself in urgent need of money due to his family circumstances. He joins the virtual game “Melo World”, which promises real world profits earned fast.

Inside Melo World, Shugo meets Himekawa Ayana, a popular streamer, and Morioka Hikaru, a wealthy player. The three form a party and begins to progress through the game.

After playing the game for a bit, they start to feel that something about the game is off. As they dig deeper to uncover the truth behind Melo World, they make a shocking discovery.

The post-apocalyptic world of Melo World isn’t just a fictional setting, it’s a reflection of Earth’s future. To make matters worse, the "god" who controls the game has been guiding humanity towards that very future.

Can they defeat the god and reclaim the future of the real world using the power they gained and the bonds they formed?
posts.alternativeTitles: ゲームで世界を救います
posts.author: EON COMICS

posts.postTitle: The Genius Wizard Who Breaks Limits
posts.postContent: Growth Limit: First Rank\r\nVerden was a researcher who dreamed of bringing glory to the magic tower through his brilliant intellect, despite having rock-bottom talent as a mage. However, after catching the tower master's eye, he became the tower's test subject. After enduring seven years of humiliation and despair, Verden begins to act—using the theories he developed during his torment and the tower's power source itself to break through his own limitations!
posts.alternativeTitles: 한계 찢는 천재마법사
posts.author: FlangK-ton, Ice Choco Painting, Kim Hyun-joon

posts.postContent:
Everything in this world is ranked.

In the quiet village of Tori lives a boy named Lowe.
One day, his peaceful life is shattered when the village is destroyed by a mysterious force known only as the Island of the gods.
Why was the village targeted? What secrets lie behind its destruction?

Determined to uncover the truth, Lowe vows to set foot on the Island of the gods himself.
But there's a catch—only adventurers ranked in the top 10 are allowed to enter the island.

To achieve this, Low begins intensive training under Adol, the number one ranked knight.
Thus begins his journey to climb the ranks, uncover the mystery, and face the gods themselves.

"I’ll become the number one ranker—no matter what it takes. And I will uncover the truth!"
posts.alternativeTitles: 와일드 랭커
posts.author: Kai Ishiyuusaku, Mizuno Hikaru

posts.postTitle: After Transmigrating into a Book, I’m Not Even the Supporting Female Character
posts.postContent:
After Su Yao finished her college entrance exams, her sister excitedly recommended a smut novel called "Coincidentally, I Also Like You."

Out of a sense of curiosity about the unknown, a thirst for knowledge, and a drive for exploration and innovation, Su Yao decided to read the book one dark and windy night.

As a result… she transmigrated into the story.
She became a nameless, faceless background character.
Thankfully, it was just a background character—if she had become anyone remotely related to the plot, she might have died from sheer stress.

After all, who dares steal the spotlight in a smut novel?

Smut novel male lead? — Avoid at all costs!
Smut novel female lead? — Definitely do not offend!
Smut novel background character? — Now that's manageable.

And so, after transmigrating as Lin Zhinian, Su Yao confidently and freely hung out with the background character Shen An.

Until one day, Lin Zhinian personally heard the smut novel male lead call out to Shen An:
“Bro.”

Transmigrated background character heroine VS Stoic but secretly passionate background character male lead
posts.alternativeTitles: 穿书后我连女配都不是

posts.postContent: Luke Othyde, the kingdom’s strongest S-rank adventurer, was executed by his own comrades for being too strong. A few months later, a man in a black helmet appears in a remote village, possessing powers greater than Luke’s. His name is Lugo. Due to his extraordinary powers, those around him view him with suspicion, but despite that, the strongest man wrapped in mystery enjoys the best slow life!

posts.postTitle: My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person
posts.postContent: The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has. In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe. With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Sand Fairy (샌드페어리), Ppilippala (삐리빠라)

posts.postTitle: The Terminal Maid’s Guide to Revenge
posts.postContent: Framed for a crime she didn't commit, Isabel died leaving behind her young daughter — only to wake up ten years later in someone else's body. A body with just one year left to live. To make matters worse, her daughter had become the wife of the very man who killed her — all for the sake of revenge. Now, with only a year left, she must save her daughter.
posts.alternativeTitles: 시한부 하녀를 위한 복수 지침서
posts.author: Haparang, Najeon, Simsim

posts.postTitle: Surviving the Inverted World with Omnipotent Skills
posts.postContent:
One day at the height of its popularity, Azure Land, the world’s best online game suddenly announced it was shutting down. While players remained shocked by the sudden news, Kakitsubata Shizuya, the game’s most legendary commander, was on his way to meet up with his guildmates in real life.

However, just as he was heading to the meetup, a loud explosion shook the area. Monsters that should only have existed within Azure Land appeared right before his eyes. The line between game and reality had broken, and humans were no longer hunters but prey. 

In a world thrown into chaos and despair, Shizuya begins his fight to survive. Can humanity endure this new, twisted reality?
posts.alternativeTitles: 全知全能のスキルで反転世界を生き残る
posts.author: Sanfu

posts.postContent: Following his sister’s death, Rou, who was once mocked as a mere freeloader, becomes an adventurer to uncover the truth behind it. After nearly losing his life in a dungeon, he awakens a mysterious ability: the power to disassemble monster corpses, supplies, and even skills. Rou grows stronger by breaking things down and little by little, the mystery of his sister’s death begins to unravel...
posts.alternativeTitles: 底辺スカベンジャーの逆襲
posts.author: EON COMICS

posts.postContent: Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.” Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead. With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Kim Kyung Yeol (김경열), JJJ (지점장)

posts.postContent: Ten years ago, a group of gods turned everyone on Earth into players of a sadistic game that forced them to kill monsters in real life - or be killed themselves. Kim Sehan has already seen how this game will play out: everyone in the world dies except for him. When he’s given the chance to go back in time and start a second playthrough, Sehan is determined to change the course of events and beat the gods at their own game.
posts.alternativeTitles: El retorno del jugador Return of the Player Возвращение игрока リターン・トゥ・プレイヤー 重生最强玩家 重返玩家：Return to Player 리턴 투 플레이어
posts.author: Index (인덱스), umky (엄키)

posts.postContent:
Cha Eunha, a first-generation hunter who disappeared inside the mysterious Unknown Gate has returned.
Wearing a black dress and carrying a parasol, she stayed behind to save her comrades and survived alone, fighting monsters for decades.
Then one day, a human appears before her and Eunha finally finds her way back to the real world.
“Welcome to the world 30 years later, senior.”
What awaits her is not the world she left, but one that has moved on without her.
posts.alternativeTitles: Lv.99 흑염의 프린세스
posts.author: 징개, 림먼주

posts.postTitle: Defective Reincarnator Becomes the Ultimate Teacher
posts.postContent:
Alt title: The Fake Master Who Accidentally Became the Strongest

One day, I was involved in a traffic accident, and when I woke up, I had been reincarnated as a genius teacher at a magic academy named Chris.

But whether it was a trick of the gods or fate, this person had a major flaw.

In this world where every living being except monsters can use magic, she was an “illegal player”—someone completely unable to use magic.

There was only one way to avoid being deemed a monster and executed:

I had to fully play the role of a “lazy but secretly talented teacher” and keep fooling the gifted students around me.

However, maybe I played the role too well…

“I’ll follow you forever, Sensei!”

“I swear my loyalty to Chris Daughton!”

Even though I’m just an ordinary reincarnated person with no magic, I somehow ended up with a bunch of overly enthusiastic disciples, and now things are even more complicated…

Ah, maintaining a character persona is truly hard.
posts.alternativeTitles: 欠陥転生者、最強師匠になりきります, 컨셉러가 최강 스승임, The Fake Master Who Accidentally Became the Strongest, The Mighty Teacher is a Roleplayer
posts.author: bosal, Soda Ice

posts.postTitle: The Great King Micheon of Gogurye

posts.postContent:
Lucas Trowman was the greatest archmage in history until he was condemned by Demigod to spend eternity losing his mind. But 4,000 years later, he’s thrust back into this world, into the body of Frei Blake, the weakest, most un-talented student at the prestigious Westroad Academy for mages. After all this time, the world of magic has barely progressed. Could this be the work of Demigod? Determined to find out, Lucas seeks to reach the highest levels of power once again and get his revenge.

---

- [Official French Translation (Delitoon)](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/retour-grand-mage)
- [Official Thai Translation (Kakao)](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87_4000_%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%B5/10)
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Nakhasan (낙하산), Barnicle (따개비)

posts.postContent: The suicide scene of the popular idol member "Lee Ari" is broadcast live on YouTube by ”cyber wreckers“, and her brother, "Lee Ahjin," is determined to uncover the truth behind his sister's unjust death.
posts.alternativeTitles: 렉카 드라이버
posts.author: TangoW

posts.postContent:
The genius lawyer Noh HyungJin’s justice-executing returner fantasy!

Valedictorian of his University, perfect score on the Bar Exam, and even a 95% case win rate. Noh HyungJin was a so-called successful lawyer. While he was fighting against evil, higher powers to make South Korea a just and fair land, he was ruthlessly murdered by National Intelligence Service agents.

“He shouldn’t have died…”

Noh HyungJin was a man sent by Emperor YeomRa to fix corruption on Earth! However, after ending up in hell without having been able to achieve anything, Emperor YeomRa returns Noh HyungJin back in time.

“I should at least give him power so he can protect himself.” What is this ‘power’ given to him by Emperor YeomRa? Will Noh HyungJin be able to change his future as well as the future of South Korea?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74662)
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: 자카예프, 스튜디오 이너스

posts.postContent: When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared! As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: JerryM (제리엠)

posts.postContent:
In an age of war, there was “Seon Hwayun,” who possessed great martial talent.
He gathered his sworn brother Yurim and six comrades to eradicate the corrupt emperor and nobles. He founded an empire where the people would not starve, placed his sworn brother Yurim on the emperor’s throne, and gave his six comrades positions as the Six Kings of the Realm to support Yurim.
However, Yurim and the Six Kings of the Realm, fearing the ever-growing prestige of Seon Hwayun, the God of War (Mushin), joined forces and murdered him.
Perhaps a god heard the God of War’s deep resentment?
The God of War, Seon Hwayun, is reincarnated as the Fourth Young Master of the Sun Palace (Taeyang Palace) and sharpens his blade for revenge.

chapters.title: Reincarnation Of The Martial God Chapter 24
Reincarnation Of The Martial God Chapter 23

posts.postContent: In a Japan transformed by the meteoric rise of the metaverse—and plagued by a wave of new, virtual crimes—Yūki Katase finds himself falsely accused of a crime committed in the digital realm. Desperate to clear his name, he turns to the legendary online urban-legend detective known as “Fictional Kyōko.” But her help comes at a steep price: in exchange for her services, Katase must give up his grip on “reality” itself. Thus begins a near‑future mystery that threads together the virtual and the real, as truth emerges from both worlds.
posts.alternativeTitles: 虚構探偵
posts.author: SEO Jun

posts.postContent: One day, a meteor falls on a once peaceful Earth, and 'Immortals' begin to appear all over the world. These individuals experience a phenomenon where, immediately upon dying, their entire bodies 'reset' to a specific point in time. Society is thrown into chaos by this super-scientific phenomenon, where even wounds or scribbles acquired after the reset point completely disappear. Now, 200 years later. Scientists have yet to unravel the secret of eternal life, and the Immortals are hunted by the state, living as fugitives or lab rats. For these beings who live on, unable to die, a rumor begins to spread from somewhere. A rumor of a man who can grant death to Immortals, a man known as the 'Undertaker'...
posts.alternativeTitles: 괴물들의 장의사
posts.author: Takungyi

posts.postContent:
Suddenly appearing in the class of Hayato Makabe—a dirt-poor, friendless, rock-bottom high school student—is Myakuzuka, a man in a white coat.
When they put on the distributed contact lenses, the "number of friends" floats above each student's head—.
"After 24 hours, the person with the lowest number will die."
The government-run "Friend Severance and Connection Project" (友達切続プロジェクト - Tomodachi Setsuzoku Project) now begins.
Deceit, betrayal, subjugation, and friendship. A death game "Class" where human relationships determine life or death.
Are "friends" shackles to be cast aside, or are they the hope that saves your life?
Splattering brains, true natures exposed.
Will Hayato truly be able to escape this hell—!?
posts.alternativeTitles: 友達カウンター
posts.author: Mayonaka Bunko

posts.postContent:
Kim Gyonsam, a man in his thirties who never knew his parents, worked at a convenience store while studying for the civil service exam, but he was sucked into the game he had played obsessively, “The World Abandoned by God”, in the body of the Empire’s underachiever, Third Imperial Prince Gillocian Elo diBalt! What’s worse, he was immediately imperiled, as the kidnapped prince was on the verge of being “disposed of” …!?
From the “minus” start as an obese ne'er-do-well, the protagonist, or rather, Gillocian will avoid all manner of perils by making full use of his intimate knowledge of the game!
posts.author: COLDCAT

chapters.title: The Transcendental Extra’s Strategy Guide Chapter 12
The Transcendental Extra’s Strategy Guide Chapter 11

posts.postTitle: The Reset Life of a Game Addict
posts.postContent: Lee Jin-ho, who cleared "Reset Life," an extremely difficult game that can only be cleared after witnessing all 99 of life's endings.

I logged into a viral virtual reality game and was given... a weird shovel. It can create anything, but monsters only attack me. After smashing everything with the shovel, strange people started to appear! Who will win? Let's find out in a fight! A crossover between the +99 Reinforced Wooden Stick and Hardcore Leveling Warrior universes!
posts.alternativeTitles: 삽가능
posts.author: Inou

posts.postContent: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
posts.alternativeTitles: 내 안에 최종보스가 들어왔다 最弱戦士からの 我，进化，恶魔 안에 최종보스가 들어왔다 No me volveré un demonio
posts.author: 黑鸟社

posts.postTitle: The Villainess Wants to Turn Over a New Leaf
posts.postContent:
Lin Feilu is an oscar-winning actress. Acting cute, slandering, feigning innocence, or playing the white lotus. Regardless, she wasn't a good person. She then died on her 27th birthday. She vowed, if there was a next life, she would be a good person. In the end, she transmigrated into a five-year-old princess of the great Lin Dynasty. Her imperial mother was not favored, her older brother was mentally challenged, and her life was constantly in danger, with having little to eat and trying to stay warm.

Lin Feilu: …You all forced me!
posts.alternativeTitles: ぶりっ子で宮廷攻略に挑みます 满级绿茶穿成小可怜 Mǎn Jí Lǜchá Chuān Chéng Xiǎo Kělián
posts.author: 博易漫画

posts.postContent:
Theron, the strongest Gardner, has come seeking the Twilight Mirror, said to grant wishes, in order to save his mother.
However, the moment he obtained the Twilight Mirror from its guardian, it shattered!
Furthermore, he learns that if it isn't repaired by the revival ceremony scheduled in one year, it will become unusable for another thousand years...
An action fantasy featuring the mismatched duo of Theron, the self-proclaimed "strongest Gardner," and Iri, the goofy guardian!
posts.alternativeTitles: 境界線の半妖たち
posts.author: J.SUN

posts.postContent: Ruud Denatos' life of living in the shadow of his talented older brother Aesir, a genius dragon slayer, ends when Aesir is killed in a brutal battle. After the fight, a hidden dragon lord appears and sends Ruud to a past where Aesir doesn't exist! In order to find answers and his older brother, Ruud takes Aesir's place and wows the school with his skills and knowledge. But will Ruud continue to impress the academy, or will the lackluster skills of his past catch up to him?
posts.alternativeTitles: ငါ့ညီက ကျောင်းမှာ နာမည် ကြီး 勇士弟弟是学院老油条 勇士弟弟超懂學院大小事 勇者の弟はアカデミーガチ勢 용사 동생은 아카데미 고인물
posts.author: Bae Hanul

posts.postTitle: Secretly Cultivating by the Demon Cult Leader’s Side
posts.postContent: He Yun, who was sold to the Nine Nether Demon Palace when he was young, became a good cook because of his “honesty and hard work”. He grew up safely and was forcibly “coughed” by the leader of the Nine Nether Demon Palace in broad daylight without any wind or rain!

chapters.title: Secretly Cultivating by the Demon Cult Leader’s Side Chapter 00

posts.postContent:
Rising actor Yuya Hiiragi becomes so immersed in preparing for his role as a "serial killer" that, before he even realizes it, he finds himself strangling his girlfriend.

Troubled by his own "murderous impulses," Hiiragi delves deeper and deeper into the "role." One night, after rehearsal, he's attacked by thugs. In that instant, his personality is hijacked by the "serial killer," and the next thing he knows, the men are lying in pools of blood.

"Let's get out of here."

His manager, Kiryu, suggests covering it up. However, a detective who sees through the truth stands in their way.

Will Hiiragi manage to continue living as an "actor"? Or will he become—?

Actor × Suspense × Psychological Warfare.

What fate awaits Hiiragi, consumed by his "role"—?

Jang Jin-myeong, a master of the forbidden Sunflower Manual, was betrayed and left to die. In his final moments, he realizes his two greatest mistakes: learning the Sunflower Manual and sparing Wang-jin and Seom-pyeong, his past comrades. However, his death isn’t the end—he wakes up 32 years in the past, his power intact and his manhood untouched. With a second chance, Jin-myeong begins his ruthless path of revenge.

In the tyrannical N Nation—now an ultra-aged society—both criminals and newly retired seniors are exiled to a grim prison isle known as “Geezer Island.” Legendary ex–special forces operative Genji Sengoku is condemned to join them… but his fearless grandson, Genki, isn’t about to let him rot out there.

Determined to save his grandfather, Genki sneaks ashore and, amid his search, uncovers a mysterious girl locked in a briefcase. No sooner does he free her than he’s hunted by the island’s violent inmates. Back on the beach, Genji senses danger and rushes toward the surf—only to witness Genki slipping beneath the waves.

“An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth.” Cast out by society and driven to the brink by his grandson’s presumed death, Genji ignites a one-man war on Geezer Island. Steel-jawed vengeance meets non-stop action in this unforgettable senior-powered revenge odyssey!
posts.author: Ikkun Yamane

posts.postContent:
In a modern city overrun by crime, its protector is widely believed to be a masked “superhero.” High‑schooler Momochi, however, is completely helpless without leaning on his best friend, Tora—and he’s painfully aware of his own weakness. One day, Tora is critically injured and falls into an unconscious coma as a result of a criminal’s schemes. Desperate to save him, Momochi makes a direct appeal to the city’s hero—but something doesn’t add up. It turns out that the one who rescued him from the criminals wasn’t that so‑called superhero at all, but a modern‑day ninja…

“It looks like you might have what it takes to be a ninja.”

Thus begins the transformation of an ordinary boy, who soon discovers extraordinary talents as a ninja operative. The ultimate spy‑style ninja action kicks off!

The latest battle action work brought to you by BONES x Yutaka Izubuchi!
Set on Mars in a future world where humans and androids (lit. "artificial humans") intermingle.
Rouge, an android girl, shoulders the harsh mission: "Assassinate the nine androids hostile to the government," alongside her partner, Naomi.
Their fierce battle unfolds against the backdrop of a sophisticated tech-noir sci-fi setting.
posts.alternativeTitles: メタリックルージュ
posts.author: BONES・Yutaka Izubuchi

posts.postTitle: The Sacrifice and the Evil God's Revenge
posts.postContent:
Lucia, I can't express how thankful I am that you're here.”

The most powerful mage family in the empire, the Rodbell family. And beneath that glorious name lies the family’s disgrace, the half-blood Rodbell.

“I’m really glad you're my daughter.”

I’ve endured all kinds of contempt and worked hard just to hear these words. For my entire life, craving affection, my father smiled for the first time and said to me, “With your lowly body, Rodbell will enjoy its golden age for the next hundred years. Be proud.”

The Abyss (Abyssus), a bottomless pit, so deep and wide that the end is invisible, where the Evil God is sealed. To maintain its power, once every hundred years, Rodbell’s bloodline must be sacrificed there.

‘I can't die like this.’

I couldn’t let my death be used and discarded for them. As they were all distracted, I tried to escape.

‘Goodbye. Foolish, dumb Lucia.’

With an angelic smile and the most dreadful malice, I fell into hell.

──────────

[Something interesting has fallen.]

In the endless darkness, a soft voice filled with laughter approached like salvation.

“I’ll help you.”

With an irresistible sweet proposal.

“How about this time, you make them fall into the abyss?”

──────────

I returned to the past.

I was about to leave after achieving everything I wanted.

“I’ll give Rodbell to you. I’ll give you whatever you desire. So…”

Why you?

The one who hated me the most.

“Don’t leave, Lucia.”

Why are you clinging to me?
posts.alternativeTitles: いけにえの私と悪神の逆襲 마도 명가 사생아의 반격
posts.author: Yun Yeo-Eum

posts.postTitle: My Kidnapper Is My Arranged Marriage Partner?!
posts.postContent: Laria is a white‑fox beastkin who’s long been branded an outcast among her own kind, unable to take on a human form. At last, she succeeds—transforming into an adorable little fox with pure white, fluffy ears. Her triumph is short‑lived, however: trapped in that form and unable to change back, she’s kidnapped by Xenox Klaseum, a black‑wolf beastkin. Though she eventually manages to escape, three years pass. Then, by order of the crown prince, Laria is compelled into an arranged marriage meeting with a stranger. Reluctantly she goes…only to find sitting across from her none other than Xenox Klaseum himself, the very one who once abducted her!
posts.alternativeTitles: お見合い相手は誘拐犯!?
posts.author: CHORMUTAK

posts.postContent:
Klaren, a princess of barbarian and mixed heritage.
Physically frail and unable to walk since childhood, she was shunned even by her servants.
During a war with the savage nation of Kairum, she was abandoned by her own family.
Driven by vengeance, she handed over the entire royal family to Kairum, earning her a noble title in recognition of her deed.
When she was granted permission by the king to raise her head, the one standing before her was Dean — once a slave.
posts.alternativeTitles: 奴隷皇帝
posts.author: Modak

posts.postContent:
From the same author of: Ninja Reincarnation: Fuuma Kotarou’s Quest to Reclaim His Humanity

"Granma didn't tell' em like that..."

Everyone has a favorite hero from their fairy tales, but who's the strongest of them all!?

This is a tale of death and rebirth. In order to accomplish their dream, hopes, wishes, revenge and salvation, the heroes of classic fairy tales will engage in a duel to death!

The warriors are resurrected and summoned to the Nightmare Coliseum by a mysterious monster who calls himself "Grimm P." and he promises the ultimate prize "You can resurrect anyone you want and live happily ever after"

This tournament is filled with bloody carnage, if you want to win, you better toss common sense out of the way because it is not needed.

This is a dark fantasy battle action manga where bizarre characters from fairy tales come to life. Legends like Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Pinocchio, and Beauty and the Beast engage in surrealistic killing matches. Right of the bat, we have Son Goku versus Momotaro!

32 characters will engage in sudden transformations, bloody battles, and tragic stories that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Sure grandma didn't tell 'em like that!!
posts.alternativeTitles: おとぎぶっ殺シアム
posts.author: Kurotaro

posts.postContent:
The world is in an era ruled by demonic gods, and humanity has long lived in fear under the rampage of monsters.

Mages who can foresee danger have become the only hope for people to safely leave their city-states.

These individuals are known as Seers.
posts.alternativeTitles: 預知者手記
posts.author: Sjont

posts.postContent:
Title: Part-Time Grim Reaper

"I’m here on assignment—from the afterlife."

Lee Do-jin is an ordinary young man whose life takes a dark turn when his younger sibling falls seriously ill. With crushing medical bills looming over him, Do-jin is desperate for a miracle. One day, he stumbles upon a strange business card and, on a whim, reaches out.

At the meeting spot, he’s approached by a mysterious silver-haired woman—a grim reaper. She offers him an unusual job: become a temporary worker for the underworld. His task? Hunt down Mokdugi, twisted soul-devourers that prey on sinful humans.

Thrust into a hidden world of spirits, monsters, and divine contracts, Do-jin must fight not only to survive—but to protect what matters most.
posts.alternativeTitles: 저승파견고용직, Part-Time Grim Reaper
posts.author: Hori

posts.postTitle: Vet in Another World: Kim Oh-jin and His Fantastic Beasts
posts.postContent:
Series Name: Kim Ohjin's Adventures with Strange Animals

One moment, Kim Oh-jin was a broke veterinarian on the brink of shutting down his clinic.
The next, he’s forcibly summoned by a dragon to treat its beloved pet.

He pulls off the impossible and expects to return home… but ends up in a whole new world instead.

Turns out, animals are animals—no matter the dimension.
And here, he’s not just a vet—he’s a legendary healer!

Time to forget the failing old clinic. The fantasy world’s Vet Clinic: Branch No. 2 is open for business!
posts.alternativeTitles: Kim Ohjin's Adventures with Strange Animals
posts.author: Giseon

posts.postTitle: Mad Love Academy Online: Favorability 0 = Dead End
posts.postContent:
A bug occurs in the world’s first full-dive otome game, *Paradise Academy Online*,  
and developer Miyuri is forced to enter the game to investigate.  
However, due to the bug, the game’s handsome heroes transform into “deranged lunatics” if their affection drops.  
In this deadly romance game, affection level zero means a dead end—  
the love-death game is about to begin.
posts.alternativeTitles: 狂愛学園オンライン ―好感度0＝デッドエンド―
posts.author: Amino Hada

posts.postContent:
“I studied through books… because I am a prince, after all.”

Hyo-un’s face flushed red again. Who wouldn’t, when a prince—handsome enough to be sculpted from jade—was nuzzling her lower belly like an affectionate puppy?

“Ah…”
“Still… I’m glad I took those lessons. They taught me how to cherish the one I love.”

Living disguised as a man and working the fields, Hyo-un’s life takes a strange turn when she picks up an ordinary-looking snail…
Except he’s not ordinary—he’s actually the runaway son of the Dragon King of the West Sea!

He says he can only survive on land if a human accepts him.
He’s charming, absurdly handsome, an excellent cook, and keeps house like a dream!

Meeting someone like this is a once-in-a-lifetime stroke of luck—
Wait, no. That’s not the point.

Should she take him in?

“You’ll need to pretend to be my wife.”
“What?”
“Which means you’ll have to wear women’s clothes.”
“M-me? Why on earth?”
“Because I need you to.”

A magical romantic comedy about a cross-dressing farmer and a runaway dragon prince pretending to be a married couple under one roof!
Let the chaos—and the love—begin.
posts.author: Ggul-Cali

posts.postTitle: Me! I'm The Strongest Forbidden Spellcaster in History!
posts.postContent:
Ye Lin transmigrated to a world overrun by demons and monsters. On the day of his class awakening, he became an SSS-rank Forbidden Spellcaster — only to be met with ridicule from those around him. Why? Because SSS-rank Forbidden Spellcasters burn their own lifespan to cast spells, making them notoriously short-lived.

But only Ye Lin knew the truth: the drawbacks of this class meant nothing to someone with immortality.

Watching Ye Lin casually unleash hundreds of forbidden spells with a wave of his hand, everyone around him was terrified.

Just how many lives do you have?! Are you using forbidden spells like basic attacks?!
posts.alternativeTitles: Supreme Curse Master
posts.author: 吃掉小杏仁

posts.postContent: From college until now, Boyoung and Haewon have maintained a long-term relationship spanning 10 years. Despite facing a harsh reality and an uncertain future, they spent their time supporting and relying on each other—until, at some point, they gradually began to quarrel. During those 10 years, they believed they knew each other better than anyone else, yet over time, understanding one another has become increasingly difficult.
posts.alternativeTitles: 장기연애
posts.author: Yeo-eun

posts.postTitle: Summon a demon, and I am the Abyss Lord
posts.postContent: Lin Tianhao, who transmigrated into this world, successfully changed jobs to the sewer profession—Summoner—on the day of the job change ceremony. Just as everyone laughed at how his life was doomed, he suddenly awakened a system and bound the identity of [Demon Sacrifice]! Who says the Summoner job is trash? I have the strongest SSS-level talent!
posts.alternativeTitles: 召唤恶魔，我既是深渊
posts.author: Hwang Sangjun

posts.postContent:
A hundred noble lady woke up inside a romance fantasy game.

Their in-game rankings was determined by each lady’s performance.

And thus, a fierce competition has begun...

Or that's what's supposed to happen.

"The real life is already so exhausting, why would i compete in some medieval world?

I got lucky enough to be here,

You bet I'm going to enjoy every moment!
posts.alternativeTitles: TOP 100 영애
posts.author: Kim seo ha

posts.postTitle: Life In A One Room Apartment With The Saintess
posts.postContent:
Alt Title: Living in a Studio Condo With the Saintess

When I drag my tired body home after a long day at work, she's always there—waiting with a smile.
The saintess.
Every day with her is full of sweet, heart-melting moments.
posts.alternativeTitles: 聖女と一間の部屋の生活, Living in a Studio Condo With the Saintess

posts.postContent: The zombie survival story of poor outcast Jeong Min-jun and rich popular girl Han Ye-na.
posts.alternativeTitles: 종말이 찾아왔다

posts.postContent: Paris-flying veterinarian named after new recruits! Kim A-young, head of the animal hospital who is struggling with loans. One day you get a phone call. "Do you see reptiles there?" I'm doing reptile therapy, which is not my major for a living. It's a reptile for use, isn't it? A blue dragon is here to see a doctor! Ahyoung Animal Hospital, where word of mouth went out when she treated him after a faint blast. New patients line up. Looking at the animals in a state of unimaginable identity, Ah-yeong was briefly taken into consideration for their generous medical expenses. "Monster? Blue Dragon? I don't know! Money is the best!" The veterinarian's new medical device. Will Ahyoung be able to treat special patients safely and return to a peaceful daily life?
posts.alternativeTitles: 접경지역의 동물병원
posts.author: Hari

posts.postTitle: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
posts.postContent:
Jin Yeo-Myeong, eldest son of the Ma Cheon-Jin family—one of the Six Great Families of the Heavenly Demon Cult.
I was ready to enjoy the sweet life, grateful for being born with a golden spoon.
But damn it, the Murim Alliance destroyed the Heavenly Demon Cult.
Then, in the final moment of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yu-Ra said to me:
“Would you try seducing me?”
posts.alternativeTitles: 마교 교주의 부군이 되었다
posts.author: Yeonjaejung

posts.postTitle: How to Send My Husband to the Abyss
posts.postContent: A noblewoman becomes the Empress' spy by marrying a mysterious count, only to discover he's far more dangerous than expected. Determined to expose his dark secrets, she plays a deadly game where the hunter might become the hunted.
posts.alternativeTitles: 남편을 나락으로 보내는 방법
posts.author: Kogamchi

posts.postTitle: The Returned C-Rank Tank Won't Die!
posts.postContent: A C-rank tank, abandoned by her teammates to die, awakens a rare regenerative ability after enduring countless deaths. Now immortal but traumatized, she must decide her next move in a world that betrayed her.
posts.alternativeTitles: 회귀한 C급 탱커가 죽지 않아!
posts.author: Wu Qing

posts.postContent: One of the four dragons called upon to maintain the balance of the world—the Guardian Dragon of Winter, Seherbian Winterbell. Over time, he grows weary and jaded, burdened by a world that always prays to winter for fear, curses, and misfortune. But when the Dragon Priest who watched over him for years, Rowan, dies, Winterbell decides to finally honor his last wish by stepping out into the world...\r\n
posts.alternativeTitles: 윈터벨
posts.author: Hua

posts.postTitle: The Hunter Lives In A rented Apartment
posts.postContent: Ten years ago, on the day of the first Great Rift, Jiho lost her father, who was a brave firefighter.\r\nShe has dedicated herself to becoming a Hunter ever since, training constantly for the Hunter Association Exam.\r\nOne day, in the midst of her training, a sudden rift outbreak engulfs her—and Jiho's life turns upside down.
posts.alternativeTitles: 그 헌터는 임대 아파트에 산다
posts.author: Kim Hungsa

posts.postContent: The last guy you’d expect. The one suit that changes everything. Kim Jiwon grew up in the shadows with no parents, no guidance, and no future. To him, a hoodie is more than just clothing—it is armor against a world that never once gave him a chance. But when he’s pulled into a dangerous incident, something hidden inside him awakens. Now, recruited into Baekya, a covert spy organization that works in the shadows, Jiwon faces a world of secrets, suits, and silent wars. This isn’t just survival. It’s a battle to find the life—and the look—that finally fits.
posts.alternativeTitles: 수트빨
posts.author: Lee Se-hyung

posts.postContent:
"Soleil"—an ultra-exclusive French restaurant no one can get a reservation for.

But once the clock strikes midnight, it transforms into a secret revenge-for-hire eatery known only as "Luna."

"Urine Champagne."

"Fritters of Fingernails and Teeth."

"Cockroach Salad with Detergent Dressing."

These grotesque "revenge dishes" are prepared by the enigmatic head chef, Zen Akui.

And if you can't stomach every last bite… a fate worse than death awaits.

Here, to grant the bitter wishes of the desperate, the sins of the wicked—those the law can’t touch—are plated and served as punishment.

“Go on—devour your sins.”
posts.alternativeTitles: 復讐レストラン
posts.author: Kantetsu

posts.postContent:
If there's Hogwarts, a wizarding school in England, then there's Muwigwan in South Korea.
The story of Jeong Tae-mi, an ordinary high school girl who was forced to enroll in a martial arts school, and her greedy life as a college entrance exam taker who can't give up her training to become a Taoist priest, begins with her turbulent growth.
I don't have a grand mission to protect the Earth, nor do I want to learn Taoism and become a Taoist.
It would be good to experience a little more—the world that Muwigwan will show you and the connections you'll make here.
Keep going for now!
posts.alternativeTitles: 도사 아카데미 무위관
posts.author: Jjima

posts.postContent:
If you're okay with it… would you join the occult club?"

Anna, a timid and gloomy outsider, has a crush on Jungwoo, the class president. She feels he's out of reach, always shining and surrounded by people. But then, she discovers Jungwoo is secretly an occult fanatic?!
posts.alternativeTitles: 호러맨스
posts.author: -2℃

posts.postTitle: I Became The Bastard Genius Of The Noble Dark Clan
posts.postContent:
By the author of Medical Return!

After breaking his back working with the Hero's Party, Chris wound up facing a dog's death.

'Please, let me be born into a wealthy family in my next life…'

When he next awoke, he was the young master of an immensely wealthy family. However, he wasn't just any noble son but Christian van Baren Kazar—the infamous, good-for-nothing bastard of the Magic Empire's Dark Magic Clan.

"Aaaagh! What the hell?!"

There were only two years left until Christian was fated to meet an untimely death. And even if he managed to survive that long, he still needed to stop the end of the world.

Chris had only one option if he wanted to survive and enjoy a life of wealth and luxury: seize control of the Dark Magic Clan and become a Demon King himself.

Though the odds were stacked against him, it seemed doable enough. Why?

'Because I'm a genius!'
posts.alternativeTitles: 암흑명가 천재 망나니가 되었다
posts.author: Yuin

posts.postTitle: Honey, I Think That’s Your Misunderstanding
posts.postContent:
Lucas Black, the Duke feared throughout the kingdom, is dangerously handsome—and absolutely terrifying. But behind the chilling aura lies a hopeless romantic with a mysterious family secret.

Grace, betrothed to Lucas in a political arrangement, faints from sheer terror every time they meet. After one too many blackouts, she finally decides: this engagement has to end.

Unfortunately, Lucas completely misinterprets her trembling—thinking it’s love at first sight. Now he’s dreaming of a blissful, romantic newlywed life with her…

Can Grace clear up the misunderstanding and get out of the engagement unscathed?
posts.alternativeTitles: 여보, 그건 당신의 오해 같은데요
posts.author: Arong Hyeri

posts.postTitle: Today's Han Yoil Is a Woman
posts.postContent:
Kim Sang-hyun dreams of becoming an idol but carries the fatal label of being a former school bully. One day, he receives an offer from a major entertainment agency executive and takes a pill that transforms him into his past life's appearance. However, his reflection in the mirror reveals a stunning beauty... but as a woman?!

Can he survive among the trainees without revealing his true identity as a man?
posts.alternativeTitles: 오늘의 한요일은 여자다
posts.author: Song Geuk-jang

posts.postTitle: The Luoyang Branch of the Heavenly Demon Cult
posts.postContent:
What does "Mu" (武) in martial hero (武俠) mean? It is the power to enforce one's own sense of justice (俠).

If that power extends beyond oneself, through others, and reaches the ends of the world, then that is the realm of the divine (神).

What does a mere human need to ascend to godhood (入神)?

Now begins the epic of Pi Wolryeo in search of that answer!
posts.alternativeTitles: 천마신교 낙양본부
posts.author: Burn (번인)

posts.postTitle: Lost Man: The Demon Lord-Class Player Who Returns from Death
posts.postContent:
In a world where dungeons suddenly appeared and skilled players compete for supremacy, a young man named Kanazaki Yukari dreams of conquering the ultimate challenge, the Luluhart Dungeon.

However, he is branded as incompetent due to having no skills and is unable to even enter a dungeon.
One day, a Dungeon Break occurs, unleashing monsters into the world. During the chaos, he rescues a gravely injured girl, who turns out to be none other than Demon Lord Luluhart.
As gratitude, she grants him a chance to save the world by sending him back in time with her power.
Now, six years in the past, Yukari must use his newly awakened Return by Death ability to challenge fate and fight to save the world!
posts.alternativeTitles: 死に戻る魔王級プレイヤー ロストマン
posts.author: Yakimo Naumi

posts.postTitle: I Want Bankruptcy, Not Marriage! (Revised Edition)
posts.postContent:
Elizabeth lost her parents in a sudden accident. Due to imperial law, an unmarried woman cannot fully inherit a noble title and wealth. To outsmart the system, she exploits the one-year inheritance suspension period, inheriting a fortune worth 30 years of the empire’s budget—then vanishes.

The family elders plan to marry her off to her uncle to prevent her inheritance from leaving the family. Refusing to wed the man who might have caused her parents' deaths, Elizabeth devises a scheme: She announces a fake engagement with her maid, escapes beyond her family's reach, and spends every last penny to ensure her financial ruin.

On the night of her fake engagement party, she gets drunk and spends the night with a man who resembles her first love. The next morning, she hastily flees—only to realize the man keeps following her.

Now, Elizabeth embarks on her *"bankruptcy journey"* with the very man she had a one-night stand with.

Will she successfully go bankrupt? Or is there an unexpected twist awaiting her?
posts.alternativeTitles: 결혼 말고, 파산하고 싶습니다 (개정판)
posts.author: Ddakjeongbeolle

posts.postContent:
Sixteen men and women participate in the dating reality show Paradise on Earth in search of perfect love. The setting? A paradise-like island with sparkling blue waters and warm sunshine all year round.

However, in the second week of filming, the paradise turns into a nightmare when staff members begin exhibiting strange symptoms after being infected by an unknown virus. All contact with the outside world is severed, and no help is in sight.

Can they survive until the end?
posts.alternativeTitles: 지상낙원
posts.author: Dalkkonyak

posts.postContent:
Orphaned after his mother’s brutal murder by a yakuza gang, Yoichi Shindo learns the truth—his estranged father was the gang’s founder, and his mother’s death was the result of a betrayal by the organization’s No.2, Mikado.
Determined to exact revenge, Yoichi infiltrates a secret academy where future yakuza leaders are trained. In a world where everyone is an enemy, he must navigate deadly power struggles, sharpen his strength, and climb the ranks—all while keeping his true intentions hidden.
Fueled by vengeance, Yoichi’s journey to the top begins. Will he become the ultimate ruler of the underworld, or will he be consumed by the darkness he seeks to destroy?
posts.alternativeTitles: 学園組織, Academy Organization
posts.author: Toukibicha

posts.postTitle: The Pay-to-Win King Conquers the Game World
posts.postContent: Tatsumi Kyo, the heir to a wealthy family, one day contracts a terminal illness and is given a prognosis of limited time left to live. Before he dies, he feels there are things he still wants to do. Among them, he decides to use ten accounts in his favorite game, "Shinyu Fantasy Legend," to achieve achievements no one has ever accomplished before. After completing this, he falls into a coma. When he wakes up, he realizes he's in the world of "Shinyu Fantasy Legend" and is shocked to find that his friends and family from the game have the exact same names and appearances as those in the real world. Which world is the real one?! After an attack by the Izumi family, Kyo realizes that "if he doesn't act, he and his loved ones will experience a game over." For the sake of himself and those he cares about, Kyo makes a resolve!
posts.alternativeTitles: tba
posts.author: tba

posts.postContent:
"Father, I’ll Be the Emperor Instead."

Born as Alicia, the only princess of the Eastern Empire and the legendary Witch of the White Night!

At the age of nine, her neglectful father—the emperor—was suddenly killed in battle.
Since things turned out this way, why not take the throne herself?

But then…

"I was wondering who dared to covet my throne, and what an interesting face I see."

Her supposedly dead father returns alive?!

"…It’s a pleasure to meet you, Father."
"Get rid of her."
"Wow, what a nasty personality.
Oops, did I just say my thoughts out loud? ^^”

A stubborn father vs. an even more stubborn daughter.
Can their broken father-daughter relationship ever be repaired?
posts.alternativeTitles: 그 아빠에 그 딸
posts.author: Ju Wolrim

posts.postTitle: X time over, I still choose you ~Oblivion Lovers~
posts.postContent: "Yes, today is your first day of amnesia." For Shiota Kai, who repeatedly loses his memories, a new day begins once again. Through encounters with his lover and friends, he struggles to reclaim his lost memories and daily life. But what awaits him beyond that—? A love story of rebirth and destruction, where past, secrets, and intertwined emotions collide
posts.alternativeTitles: X Eme mo Kimi ga Ii ~Boukyaku no Koibito-tachi~, X回目も君がいい ～忘却の恋人たち～
posts.author: Beyama Kou, Tomizu

posts.postTitle: The Top Ranker's Aspiring Writer Life Manual
posts.postContent: A legendary hunter gives up his title to become a web novelist, only to realize his stories lack realism. To fix this, he disguises himself as a weak F-rank hunter and joins a struggling guild for research. What starts as simple observation turns into genuine admiration, pushing him to grow both as a person and a writer. Can a former god-like warrior succeed as an ordinary novelist?
posts.alternativeTitles: The SSS-Ranker Who Wrote His Own Legend, 탑랭커의 작가지망생활백서
posts.author: Churuhanjan, Gesal

posts.postTitle: The Island where Stars and Chains Rise
posts.postContent: Gi Seunghyun always dreamed of becoming a Hunter, but he is plagued by despair due to his lack of ability. Then one day, his older sister, Gi Sohyun, awakens from a 12-year coma. Just as they begin to reunite, the siblings find themselves caught in an unfathomable, shocking event.
posts.alternativeTitles: 별과 사슬이 뜨는 섬, Island of Stars and Chains
posts.author: catfish

chapters.title: There Is No Night That Never Dawns

posts.postTitle: The God’s Chosen ~ god of the Infected~
posts.postContent: Humanity was attacked by monstrous beings known as Carriers, emerging from a tunnel that suddenly connected to another world. As if that weren’t enough, an unknown virus began infecting people, leading to widespread death. Despite being a Purifier tasked with hunting down Carriers, Kaito Saeki, a frail young man, fights on the battlefield, risking his life to earn money for his equally sickly younger sister’s medical treatment. However, his days are filled with both battle and bullying from his own comrades. One day, an unidentified new-type Carrier appears, leaving Kaito in a desperate, inescapable situation…!! At the brink of death, refusing to give up on life, he suddenly encounters a mysterious girl who effortlessly wipes out the Carriers before his eyes. With a fearless smile, she makes him an offer: “Become my host.”
posts.alternativeTitles: 神の適合者〜ゴッド・オブ・インフェクテッド〜
posts.author: Kino Yuuki

posts.postTitle: The Fate of the Lustful Beasts
posts.postContent: A young delivery driver named Michio Sagara has a hudden and twisted fetish. He can only become aroused through voyeuristic filming. Night after night, he indulges in his secret obsession, satisfying his distorted desires. As this lifestyle continues, simple voyeurism is no longer enough to satisfy him. Seeking greater thrills, he ventures into an abandoned video store rumored to be a hotspot for compensated dating. There, just as the rumors suggested, a middle-aged man arrives with a mysterious beauty in a school uniform, Momoko Mikami. The two enter the video store and immediately begin touching each other, and just as things are about to escalate, Momoko suddenly stabs the man to death. She, too, harbors a twisted fetish. Her desires can only be fulfilled through murder. Reaching her climax from the act, Momoko’s ecstasy is witnessed by Sagara, awakening a new fetish within him as he experiences his own peak. Eventually, the two join forces to satisfy their warped cravings, taking it upon themselves to eliminate the depraved criminals lurking in the city…
posts.alternativeTitles: Kyousei ~Seijuu-tachi no Matsuro~, 共性～性獣たちの末路～
posts.author: Kimura Takashi

posts.postTitle: The Demon Emperor Desires a Hero
posts.postContent: Betrayed and faced with death by the one he trusted, the Demon Emperor meets his end. Having always longed for death, he welcomes his final moments with a sense of peace. However, 66 years later, he awakens in an unfamiliar body. To his surprise, this body is referred to as a 'hero'? The Demon Emperor never meant to exist for the sake of peace! Eventually, he embarks on a journey once again, not to seek happiness, but to embrace death...
posts.alternativeTitles: 마황은 용사를 바란다, The Demon Emperor Wishes for a Warrior
posts.author: Sense, Onsol-i, Villain Donkatsu

posts.postContent: Three ancient undead (Zombie, Mummy, and Vampire) who couldn't die for a thousand years each with their own reasons, longs to become young again and live a complete, ordinary human life. But the price is…
posts.alternativeTitles: 超级变小形态, Yong Sheng Qu Si Ba!, Eternal Life to Death!, Super Shrinking Form
posts.author: 开水, 一童

posts.postContent:
In modern-day Shibuya, ninjas still exist.

One of them is Enma, a master of fire techniques and the second son of the Iga Six Brothers. The brothers covertly protect the city by accepting requests for helping people and conducting spy missions.

However, following the shocking event where the eldest brother, Shido, murders their father, Enma and his siblings become entangled in a series of incidents and battles against rival Koga ninjas.
