The central question remains: Can Enma reunite his family and continue safeguarding the streets of Shibuya?
posts.alternativeTitles: 渋谷忍者
posts.author: Aonuma Kaeru, Tailpot, Odoru Issei, Amepa (あめぱ)

posts.postContent: He had been living as a killer known as number 205, but one day, the landlady ordered him to kill number 204, whom he had followed like his own brother, with his own hands. After being consumed by regret, one day, the landlady’s daughter, Go Eunhye, moves into room 204 and suggests to number 205 that they kill the landlady together...
posts.alternativeTitles: No. 205 Go Eun-Hye, 205호 고은혜, นักฆ่าหมายเลข 205
posts.author: Kim Songpa

posts.postContent:
Ian Percus, a third-year student from the Academy's swordship department, wakes up one morning to find a flip calendar on his desk and a letter he doesn't remember receiving. The letter contains a cryptic message: "If we don't protect the future, the world will perish."

When he goes to the Academy, he finds out that, unbeknownst to him, a week has passed and that during that time, he defeated a previously undefeated junior.

At first, Ian is skeptical, but as the events described in the letter begin to unfold, he gradually starts to believe what is written.

What on earth happened during the week he has no memory of...?

Will Ian be able to protect the future?
posts.alternativeTitles: 未来からのラブレター〜滅亡する世界の英雄は俺！？〜, 미래에서 온 연애편지
posts.author: Alcoholic/ HOTAE, Yeohan

posts.postContent:
"Once you’re in, the only way out is death!"

Former hitman Jeong Do-gyun thought he’d left that life behind. Now retired, he keeps a low profile, working at a café run by Gu Sang-hyeok—the closest thing to family he has following their days spent in an orphanage.

But one day, Sang-hyeok vanishes without a trace. Following his trail, Do-gyun finds himself on a remote, mysterious island—only to discover a horrifying truth. The island is a prison, filled with kidnapped victims forced into slavery, watched over by merciless killers.

And to make matters worse, the man who murdered his family is here, too.

With a vengeance burning in his veins, Do-gyun prepares for the fight of his life. It’s him against an army of ruthless assassins—only one side is making it out alive.
posts.alternativeTitles: 킬링필드, Killing Fields, Tử Vực, Поля убийства

posts.postTitle: If I don't Die Soon, I'll Rule the Demon Realm!
posts.postContent: Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…
posts.alternativeTitles: 再不死我就统治魔界了, If I Don't Die Soon, I'll Become the Ruler of the Demon Realm!, Zài Bu Sǐ Wǒ Jiù Tǒngzhì Mójièle,  カリオンに死は訪れない
posts.author: Hama

posts.postTitle: I Regressed but the World Didn’t Fall Apart
posts.postContent:
Lee Do-hyeok returned to the past to save the world. He was told to prepare as much as possible.

But… the world isn’t ending. Now all that’s left for Do-hyeok is a mountain of debt.

"I’ll pay you a salary, so just help me with my game streaming!"

... And so, he started game streaming. But for some reason, it’s way too easy?

Watch a former hero’s debut as a game streamer!
posts.alternativeTitles: 회귀했는데 세상이 안 망함, I Regressed, but the World Didn't End, I Regressed, but the World Isn't Ruined, I Regressed but the World Didn't Fall
posts.author: Son Byeong-jun (손병준), Seonwoo (선우), Nemga

posts.postTitle: Guide to be King of the Dead
posts.postContent:
When she opened her eyes, she was in the underworld.

Suddenly, she became a possible successor for the position of Lord of the Dead!

Ji-hwa, who was once an ordinary job seeker, now embarks on her journey to become the King of the Dead.
posts.alternativeTitles: Guide to Rule the Netherworld, Guide to Yeomra, Guide to Be King of Underworld, Guide to Be King Yeomra, Guide to Be Yeomra, 염라를 위한 안내
posts.author: Tasso, Jung (정)

posts.postContent:
Cheok Ryugeom, a Goryeo swordsman, threw himself off a cliff holding the enemy for his master's sake.

However, he wakes up in the modern era—900 years later—after being frostbound...

This is the revenge tale of Goryeo's top swordsman in the modern era.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Frostbound Warrior, 냉동무사, Kesatria Es
posts.author: Toy, Park Mansa, Choi yong jun

posts.postTitle: A Spy's Survival in the Demonic Cult
posts.postContent: Jang Yiseo, a spy from the Murim Alliance who infiltrated the Demonic Cult, was given his first and last mission. To make the notoriously unruly Seventh Young Master, Ma-oh, the Vice Cult Leader! Despite his extraordinary martial prowess, Yiseo’s potential was hindered by his frail constitution. Meanwhile, Ma-Oh, a prodigious yet unpredictable force, walked the fine line between genius and madness. As their fates intertwined, the two had to navigate treachery, power struggles, and the ever-present risk of exposure. Can Jang Yiseo make Ma-Oh rise to the rank of being second only to the Cult Leader, or will the shadows consume them first?
posts.alternativeTitles: The Spy Life in the Demonic Sect, 첩자의 마교생활
posts.author: DAE Eunho, DALGON

posts.postContent:
The news of the destruction of the Earth, which had been floating around as nothing but nonsense, came out on the convenience store TV.
At that moment, with a bang! I lost consciousness and woke up a few days later,
but the city had already turned into nothing more than ruins.
‘Where am I...? And who am I?’
An old man who had died and a tattoo shaped like an ‘eye’ in the male protagonist’s lost memories.
In search of his memories, he heads to the shelter with the female protagonist,
but will the two protagonists be able to survive the 465 days before the Earth is supposed to be destroyed?
posts.author: NEUK Dae Sam, Hwang Sangjun

posts.postTitle: Ninja Reincarnation: Fuuma Kotarou’s Quest to Reclaim His Humanity
posts.postContent:
Ninja Reincarnation: Fuuma Kotarou’s Quest to Reclaim His Humanity

In the 15th year of the Tenmon era, Fuuma Kotarou—the fifth in a long line of fierce warriors—fought for survival in a world torn apart by endless warfare and haunted by dark, supernatural forces. Driven by a single, unyielding resolve—to do whatever it took to stay alive—he cut down countless foes, narrowly escaping death time and again. Yet fate had its own plans: captured and executed, his life seemed to come to a tragic end.

But just when all hope was lost, a mysterious figure known only as “The Seer of Worlds” reached out to him. In that fateful moment, the cycle of reincarnation was unleashed, and Fuuma Kotarou was reborn in a completely new realm—a second chance to reclaim the humanity he once lost.

posts.postTitle: The Marriage-Seeking Demon King & the Repeat-Year Hero
posts.postContent:
What if, upon returning to the real world, the hero receives a marriage proposal from the Demon King!?

Meguru Kitaki, who was transported to another world and became a hero, clashed fiercely with the Demon King in the final battle—seemingly settling everything once and for all. But when he awoke, he found himself in a hospital in the real world.

Reeling from the shock of leaving behind a smooth and triumphant life in another world, Meguru resumes life as an ordinary high school student. After being discharged from the hospital, he encounters a girl who looks like an elementary school student, yet boldly claims to be the Demon King—and even goes so far as to propose marriage!

A riotous, rival-turned-romantic comedy unfolds between a daring, naive, and cute Demon King and a returning hero caught in a whirlwind of chaos.
posts.alternativeTitles: 求婚魔王と留年の勇者
posts.author: Arai Chaser

posts.postTitle: I Don't Believe in Dating Apps!
posts.postContent:
Series Introduction

There's no way you can find your soulmate on a dating app!

Office worker Yui Yokomizo has had nothing but disastrous experiences with dating apps. Just when she finally meets her ideal guy, he ends up cheating on her, leading her to swear off dating apps for good.

Then, her company announces "Sharela," a next-generation AI dating app, and all employees are required to register as monitors.

Sharela, boasting a 99% success rate in forming couples, pairs Yui with none other than the company president, Hiroto Sakakibara!?

Yui, who absolutely refuses to believe in dating apps, challenges President Sakakibara to a head-to-head showdown, with the app's future on the line.

"If you fall in love with me, my app wins!" A love battle where the one who falls in love loses!
posts.author: Kei Misawa

posts.postContent: Welcome to “Chrono Life,” a virtual reality game where only the strongest survive. Ji-u logs in to “Chrono Life,” only to be ignored and ridiculed by the other players for his lack of experience, crappy items, and being an overall noob. But when he upgrades his wooden stick to the max reinforcement level of +99, Ji-u realizes he has the power to split continents and slay armies of thousands in just one swing. “It’s time to teach the rest of you a lesson, you f*ckers.”
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Hong-Sil (홍실)

posts.postTitle: I'm Done Being My Big Sister’s Sidekick
posts.postContent: To avoid conflicts with her older sister, Charlotte always played the role of the plain, supportive sidekick to her brilliant sibling. However, once she enrolled in a magic academy, whispers began calling her "a selfish, hopeless failure," leaving her isolated. Outraged by the baseless rumors, she’s shocked to discover that it was her own sister, Scarlett, who started them! Now, wielding magic of legendary caliber, Charlotte finally unleashes her true abilities in this grand underdog fantasy.
posts.alternativeTitles: 姉の引き立て役に徹してきましたが、今日でやめます
posts.author: Aamond

posts.postContent:
She was reincarnated into a novel as the villainess’ supporter and died a tragic death after harassing the heroine. To avoid her death, she gave everything to Suzanne, the heroine and helped her get her happy ending. But…  
  
“Think back on your sins. You are convicted of attempted murder, high treason…”  
  
She was betrayed in the end…  
  
“Goodbye, foolish countess. Ah, I forgot that you’re not a countess anymore,” Suzanne chuckled.  
  
The heroine’s vicious nature, which she learned on the brink of her death. At that last moment, she thought.  
  
‘If I was given another chance, I…’  
  
* * *  
  
“No way! …I returned?”  
  
She went back to the day before she met the heroine. The worst mistake she had made in her previous life.  
  
[History is written by the victors.]  
  
She will no longer be the heroine’s s*ave. She swears to come out victorious and have her own happy ending!
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Geolgeom

posts.postContent:
In an era where necromancers create their own knights to fight, "War of the Corpses" is the ultimate sport.
Amidst a brutal battle where countless people pour their passion and dreams into the fight, who will emerge as the final victor?
posts.alternativeTitles: 시체들의 전쟁
posts.author: Mayonaguri

autoUnlockLog.message: Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)

posts.postTitle: My First Case: The Corpse of My Ex-Girlfriend
posts.postContent: In anatomy class, the corpse I was supposed to work on turned out to be that of my ex-girlfriend… From that moment on, I experienced countless bizarre and unexplainable events. A bus that only goes up and never down, directly to the abandoned reservoir, a bus that is out of service. The branches and leaves in the hospital are lush and luxuriant, an old locust tree that eats people without a trace. On the Clear Water River bank, a large silver carp cries out for help every night. And a deadly brothel, draped in human skin, that never closes its doors. Endless and relentless, as if there will never be an end…

chapters.title: My First Case: The Corpse of My Ex-Girlfriend Chapter 11
My First Case: The Corpse of My Ex-Girlfriend Chapter 10

posts.postTitle: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists
posts.postContent:
MMA world champion Kim Jin-ho has awoken in the wold of Last Saver, as the wizard Zed Arahan.

In this other world, knights are close range and wizards are long range. However, it seem like Zed doesn't have any magic power?!

A genius who breaks the immutable law has appeared!
posts.alternativeTitles: The Genius Magician Who Uses His Fist • 주먹 쓰는 천재 마법사 • Genius Mage Who Uses Fists • The Genius Mage Who Fights With Their Fists • The Genius Magician Who Uses His Fist
posts.author: Wolcheon, Team Potato Scones

posts.postTitle: A High Schooler with Cheat Abilities: A Long Yet Short Seven Days of Survival
posts.postContent: Rin, a lackluster high school boy, is unexpectedly reincarnated into another world along with 20 of his classmates following a fateful bus accident. A self-proclaimed god named Adora announces that “the person who becomes the most famous in this world gets to decide who dies.” As the gods’ ulterior motives gradually come to light and the heartbreaking reality is revealed, they find themselves caught in a struggle for redemption—banding together as allies and clashing as foes. What was meant to be their desperate fight over seven days (Earth time) in another world takes an unforeseen twist when Rin, whom the god declared capable of even greater feats than Himself, entrusts a profound sentiment to his childhood friend Hitomi.
posts.alternativeTitles: チート能力を持った高校生の生き残りをかけた長く短い七日間
posts.author: KITA Kitsune

posts.postContent: After losing everything in a war with the all-powerful Queen, Aden is reborn as Han Taemin, an ordinary man who cleans up after hunters in a world ravaged by monsters. But one day, when a disastrous dungeon raid ends with Taemin as the sole survivor, he suddenly awakens and becomes a hunter. With his new abilities and mana training, he starts gathering other hunters who seemingly have strange connections to his past life. Can Taemin save the world in this life and avenge his past self?
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Neuf

posts.postTitle: Dominating with the EX-Skill Hero Master
posts.postContent: “I know this scene all too well…!” Serizawa Eriya, a young man living a life of hardship, is left to support his remaining family member, his little sister, after his father died and mother fell ill. His life, which was already miserable from being scorned and treated almost like a slave by a politician’s good-for-nothing son, takes a dramatic turn the day he clears a game called Valhalla’s Cradle, his only source of solace. “The game I was so immersed in is becoming a reality?!” From the depths of the ocean, the final dungeon, “The Castle”, emerges, and at the same time, monsters begin to ravage every corner of the land. The only way to stop them is to conquer The Castle, and Eriya is the only one in the world who knows how to do it. A story of turning the tables from the very bottom begins to unfold―!
posts.alternativeTitles: 最強ゲーマーEXスキル英雄使いで無双する  EdItOr CaNt eDiT 最強ゲーマーEXスキル英雄使いで無双する • Saikyou Gamer EX Skill Eiyuu Tsukai de Musou Suru
posts.author: Tsushima Naoto, KIWADO Ishouri
posts.artist: Yakupan, ENKO Unagi, Studio Attsu, KUROKI Takafumi

posts.postTitle: I'm the Only Ranker Who Can Clear the Hidden Dungeon
posts.postContent: This is the story of a protagonist who delves into various dungeons and sticks to his motto. a new profession called Dungeon Adventurer'' emerged and began to attract attention, which used magic and skills to exterminate magical beasts.
posts.alternativeTitles: 俺だけ隠しダンジョン制覇のランカー
posts.author: Kasanaki Kosame

posts.postTitle: I’m the Only One with Outstanding Cheats After My Class Got Transported to Another World?!
posts.postContent:
Ryuuto was subjected to rampant bullying on an almost daily basis. But on what looked like another day of living hell for him, the classroom was suddenly enveloped in blinding light, and he found himself standing before a man who called himself God! Ryuuto had been transported to another world, and unfortunately… so were his bullies.

However, when he saw his stats, Ryuuto realized he was the only one with overpowered cheats! Having received invincible cheat abilities from the Supreme God, Ryuuto quickly grows close to the class idol Himeno as well as Sherelle, a princess belonging to the other world… On top of that, there’s the appearance of an adorable divine spirit and a clumsy girl who had been sealed away!

How will Ryuuto’s newfound, 1000% different from reality harem and overpowered life in another world turn out?!
posts.alternativeTitles: クラス転移で俺だけずば抜けチート!? • Class Ten'i de Ore Dake Zubanuke Cheat!?
posts.author: unsick

posts.postContent:
To martial artists, he was known as the Sword Calamity or the Sword Monster, but to the common folk, he was a savior. About thirty years ago, Junghyun, the strongest and most fearsome monster in the history of the Wudang Sect, suddenly disappeared without a trace after the Heavenly Demon died.

And after some time had passed, Junghyun, who had maintained his youth, reappeared in the martial world, bringing with him a young girl. This girl was Sojin, the granddaughter of the Heavenly Demon, Junghyun only true rival and friend in life. 

Junghyun embarks on a journey to Mount Wudang with Sojin.
"Will the two be able to complete their journey safely?"
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)

posts.postContent: The world was suddenly attacked by a dungeon phenomenon. Mankind was able to overcome this disaster due to the Awakeners who could control the Gate Cards that had appeared along with the dungeons. In the midst of that, Okita Hikaru, someone who was barely able to qualify as an Awakener, was being oppressed by the Elite Awakeners in a company that dealt with dungeon capturing as a business. One day, after he was driven to the brink of death by a fierce dungeon monster and a despicable betrayal, Okita obtained a power beyond what humans could comprehend, one that allowed him to infinitely manipulate Gate Cards. Okita, who has become the strongest being that transcends the laws of this world, will never end his counterattacking turn against those who have oppressed him!
posts.alternativeTitles: 日本語 (にほんご／にっぽんご)
posts.author: OTCL

posts.postTitle: A World of Gold to You
posts.postContent:
Once upon a time, the world had been divided into the Moon Kingdom, inhabited by humans, and the Sun Kingdom, inhabited by demons. Estelle, a knight of the Moon Kingdom, loses her family to an ambush from the demons and is sentenced to life in exile after becoming entangled with a mysterious demon child. To survive, she sets out to a mysterious tower in the north with her companions. A timid knight, a slave boy, and a shadow who was once the Demon King.

This is an alluring story about three people embarking on an adventure to find their true selves.
posts.alternativeTitles: 황금의 세계를 너에게
posts.author: Remin

posts.postTitle: The Most Handsome Man Becomes a Skeleton
posts.postContent: In a world where even monsters can't resist his charm, Louis, the most handsome man alive, faces an unexpected twist of fate. One day, a deadly plague sweeps through his village, claiming Louis as one of its victims. However, upon his death, he exclaims, "Where did my sculpted face go? What's with this skeleton head?!" Now, as the strongest and most handsome man in the world-stripped of both beauty and ugliness-Louis embarks on a journey filled with trials and tribulations as a skeleton. Will Louis be able to reclaim his human form and return to his life as the world's most handsome man?\r\n\r\n
posts.alternativeTitles: 절세미남 망나니 해골 되다, The Peerless Handsome Man Becomes a Skeleton
posts.author: Kim Seon-Yong, Iluda

posts.postContent: Mikhail Walpurgis didn't feel qualified for the title of Hero, and instead let the warrior Siegfried lead the prophesied battle against the Devil. But after Siegfried dies and the army is defeated, Mikhail has one last move before the end of the world. And so he turns back time. Now, Mikhail has the chance to reclaim the title he gave up and save everyone. The only problem is, no one believes the prophecy about the war! Can Mikhail manage to gather an army and make this life count?
posts.alternativeTitles: 회귀로 초월하는 대마도사
posts.author: Hong Chang Joo, Hanbit Nuri

posts.postContent: In a world where werewolves coexist with humans, Han Ji-woo, the only daughter of the werewolf clan leader, encounters the nation’s son, actor Cheon Yu-seung.\r\n\r\nBut… what on earth is this guy? Why does an ordinary celebrity make the power of wolves stronger?
posts.alternativeTitles: 짐승같은 것들
posts.author: Kim Tae Hee

posts.postContent:
Lee Do-Hyun decides to live together with his older sister in Seoul in order to re-enroll in college. But his once exemplary sister now turned into an unfilial daughter who became obsessed with streaming games.

Eventually, Do-Hyun is forced to play his first game ever due to his sister’s need for entertainment and donations for her gaming streams. But Do-Hyun reveals his incredible prowess that no one knew about.

A gaming stream with a divinely talented brother and a devilishly greedy sister begins!
posts.alternativeTitles: 천재의 게임방송
posts.author: Jigeum (지금), High end (하이엔드)

posts.postContent: During college, Hayato became obsessed with the VR game [FINAL KINGDOM], which led to him failing to secure a job. After unsuccessful attempts at finding work, he turned to selling items from the game in the real world but struggled to make a living. One day, he discovered the soul of Ikezaki Kokone, the Game Master who created [FINAL KINGDOM] in the same game. This marked the beginning of Hayato’s journey as a rising player.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Gaming Expert, 俺だけが魔王も創造主も支配する, Ore Dake ga Maou mo Souzounushi mo Shihai Suru, Game Expert, Only I Will Rule Both the Demon King and the God, 겜잘알, Good Game (S)
posts.author: S, Pencil

posts.postContent: After a long-standing battle between the demons and humanity, the Demon King Luruslia Nord was laid to rest at the hands of a hero. However, his soul continued to wander. After thousands of years, Luru awakened in a world devoid of demons. Moreover, he was reincarnated as a weak human! To search for his disappeared brethren and to understand the meaning of the new "life" he's been granted, Luru sets forth on a new adventure.\r\n\r\n
posts.alternativeTitles: Revived the Devil, Revive the Devil, 蘇りの魔王
posts.author: Okano Yuu

posts.postTitle: Super Uncle: The Invincible Hitman Who Wants to Live Quietly
posts.postContent: Makoto Ifukube seems like an ordinary, unremarkable supermarket clerk. But his true identity is... a former top agent wielding overwhelming power to fulfill every customer card request! Get ready for the ultimate, feel-good action spectacle!
posts.alternativeTitles: スーパーおじさん～無敵のヒットマンは静かに暮らしたい～
posts.author: Mariyuki Imajo

posts.postContent: In the year 20XX, Japan enacts the “Senior National Law.” On his way to work, junior citizen Ikeda Kazuki is suddenly attacked by a senior citizen. Seniors fire recklessly and mercilessly slaughter anyone of lower status. Just as the muzzle turns on Kazuki—an enormous piece of metal hurtles down from the sky and fuses with him, transforming into a battle suit!\r\n\r\nSet in a dystopian near-future Japan, this is an exhilarating battle-action story of a boy who comes into possession of the most powerful “Cheetahweight” battle suit!
posts.alternativeTitles: 鋼鉄の下級国民【フルカラー】
posts.author: deadhead

posts.postContent:
Title: Love Review
Author: Rahee
Illustrator: Rahee
Publisher: Monday Webtoon
Age Rating: 15+

Kijoo is known for being more rational than anyone—except when it comes to love. Every time she falls for someone, she turns into a total pushover. Convinced things would be different with her latest boyfriend, she ends up in a heated argument that sends her tumbling down a staircase.

When Kijoo wakes up in the hospital, a strange "review window" appears before her eyes. "What is this? Reviews from his ex-girlfriends... rating him?!" Could this mysterious system actually help salvage her love life—or is it just another twist of fate?
posts.author: Rahee

posts.postTitle: I’m Level 999, But I Only Have One Year To Live
posts.postContent: \r\n The “burden” of the hunting guild, Jekyll, continues his work as a hunter to support his only family—his younger sister. Despite being looked down upon and ridiculed by those around him, Jekyll endured it all, desperately facing the challenges of monster hunting. However, one day, he is suddenly told about his limited “lifespan.” Standing on the brink of despair, Jekyll is approached by a demon who offers him a “deal.” What choice will Jekyll make to change his fate—!?
posts.alternativeTitles: Lv.999だけど寿命が1年しかない俺
posts.author: Su Okubo

posts.postContent:
Max-level internal arts, max-level external arts.

Jianghu, Murim’s famous and strongest, Cha Shin Hyeon.

I came back to Earth after reaching the peak of martial arts, but why has everything changed so much?

A world where monsters are coming out of dungeons, and hunters are leveling up via their status windows.

‘Start again from level one? That doesn’t phase me at all, since my martial arts are already at the max level.’
posts.alternativeTitles: Leveling Beyond the Max, 만렙부터 레벨업, カンストからのレベルアップ • 一級武林至尊, 从满级开始升级
posts.author: Endlessea (해무극), Kim Sanglok (김상록)

posts.postContent:
The human race plunged into a war against dragons, who have invaded the earth. At the same time, among the humans arose people with supernatural powers, called psykers.

Through the countless sacrifices of psykers, the war seemed to be coming to an end with the human race as the victors. But when a psyker with the ability to see the future foretold that the dragons will be returning in 15 years, the people established Ark, a facility to train children born with psychic abilities to prepare for the last war of the human race.

There are only three years remaining until the prophesized war. What will happen next?!
posts.alternativeTitles: 킬 더 드래곤, Asesino de Dragones, 屠龍戰爭, 屠龙战争
posts.author: Baeksu Noble (백수귀족), J-Sun (현가), Miss Jisu (미스 지수)

posts.postContent: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
posts.alternativeTitles: 暴力の代価, 폭력의 대가, Price of Violence
posts.author: Meen, 변장욱, Byeon Jang-Wook

posts.postContent:
Amon Drake, harboring dreams of prosperity, arrives at Amonith Academy, renowned for its prestigious history. But on his first day as a teacher, he receives shocking news.

“Haven’t you heard? This academy is on the brink of bankruptcy, and the only people left at the academy are the gambling dean and the alcoholic teachers.”

Amon thought, “If the academy fails, wouldn’t my contract become void?”

They say the right exit strategy is a measure of intelligence. If you don’t want to risk your career, let the academy fail. So began the wisest man in the world’s escape from the academy.
posts.alternativeTitles: The Academy Is Doomed , 아카데미가 망했다
posts.author: ROHRAN

posts.postTitle: The Regressed S-Class Adventurer's Quest Life
posts.postContent:
Dungeons began to suddenly appear throughout the world!

Kyomi Aki became an S-Class adventurer assassin with his tremendous speed. Unfortunately, assassins were considered as a failure class. His class was becoming harder and harder to master the more he advanced. The class itself had a low attack power and mana, so he needed to always rely on someone else.

One day, Aki encountered a dangerous monster that could wipe out the entirety of humanity. He somewhat managed to subjugate the monster, but lost his life in the process.

Suddenly, he awoke and found himself having regressed 20 years into the past. He also received an additional “Bonus Quest” as a reward for solo killing the monster.

With his knowledge from his previous lifetime and this “quest,” Aki resolved himself to redo everything to become the strongest adventurer!
posts.alternativeTitles: 帰還したS級冒険者のクエスト生活, Kikanshita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu
posts.author: CK, Miyashima

posts.postTitle: Return of the SSS-Class Demon Lord
posts.postContent:
A man who fell into the demon world returns to Earth as the most powerful demon lord with absolute power.

However, what awaits him are mysterious monsters. Slash! Blood stitches the air, and the man’s voice echoes once more. “I’ve finally returned.”

The Demon Lord’s return to Earth marks the beginning of the ultimate battle!
posts.alternativeTitles: SSS급 마왕의 귀환, Return of the SSS-Class Demon King
posts.author: Guyu, Story Ark, Na Geunmo, Momo (모모)

posts.postContent: “Strength and power, that’s all there is in this world.” As someone living a poverty-stricken life, Yunfei, an orphan of the Donghua Clan, is considered the weakest in the world simply because he lacks power. To escape this wretched fate, he chooses the path of a eunuch. Yunfei receives the seed of the ultimate martial arts technique, the Extreme Yin Art of Bai Yihong, and becomes part of the emperor’s special forces as part of the [Great Murim Extermination Plan]. In this era of great upheaval, amidst constant intrigues and fierce power struggles, the story follows the escapades of “Yunfei”, a master of deceit and cruelty, as he navigates the world of martial arts with his ice arts!
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Samadal

posts.postContent:
Among the Five Great Clans, the Moyong Clan of the North has always endured harsh winters to defend against invasions from foreign tribes. At the age of 17, Moyong Hyeon narrowly escaped death in a battle with these invaders. In a fateful encounter, he met an old man named Cheonhyeol, who passed on the Heopseong Dae Beop (Great Art of Energy Absorption) to him.

Moyong Hyeon soon discovered that this martial technique was not merely about absorbing internal energy but allowed him to absorb the martial skills of others entirely. As a power struggle unfolds between the Nine Great Schools and the Five Great Clans, the Moyong Clan, which had made countless sacrifices to fend off foreign invaders, faces the brink of annihilation.

Determined to protect his family and legacy, Moyong Hyun wields the Heopseong Dae Beop in a desperate fight to restore the Moyong Clan’s honor and survival.
posts.alternativeTitles: 모용전기, Biography of the Moyong
posts.author: Lim Dalpaeng

posts.postContent:
A man who knows nothing about martial arts or the martial world roams the land armed with nothing but a strangely-shaped sword. As he journeys across the rivers and lakes of Jianghu, he gradually becomes a nameless legend in his own right.

**Original Webtoon:**  
[Mootoon](https://www.mootoon.co.kr/comic/moo_list.mg?tcode=yl5f), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9277889), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59514091)
posts.alternativeTitles: Nameless Island
posts.author: 하승남

posts.postContent:
"Mount Heng Sect is my home, and my senior brothers are my family!"

Ignored by his indifferent father and tormented by his stepmother, a young boy named Lee Goonak was sold off for a mere twenty gold coins and sent to the Mount Heng Sect.

For the first time in his life, Goonak felt the warmth of affection and the happiness of belonging. However, his training journey alongside his master was filled with life-and-death battles and unbearable solitude, leaving him with only one dream: to return to the Mount Heng Sect.

Ten years later, after being struck by lightning, Goonak mastered the Mount Heng Sect's exclusive martial art, the *Golden Eye Thunder Spirit Art*, reaching near perfection at the 12th level. At last, he was able to return to the sect.

Now, Goonak's struggle to protect the Mount Heng Sect and his senior brothers begins!

**Original Webtoon:**  
[MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000054182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60513863)
posts.alternativeTitles: 아! 형산파
posts.author: tba

posts.postContent: ...Wudang Has Fallen!!! After a long mission, the second disciple, Chung-yeop, returns home--only to find the main sect in ruins. Stricken with despair, Chung-yeop becomes a shadow of his former self, consumed by hopelessness. But hope is not entirely lost! Seok-hyun and Mu-young, still clinging to a glimmer of optimism, refuse to give up. Can Wudang rise from its ashes and reclaim its former glory? And you, Chung-yeop--pull yourself together already! Stop wallowing and do something, you useless worm!!! ...Wudang Has Fallen!!!
posts.alternativeTitles: Battle Without Sect, The Legend of Wudang, 武當廢人傳, 무벌전
posts.author: tba

autoUnlockLog.message: Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 1 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)
Unlocked 2 chapter(s)

posts.postTitle: The Rogue Young Master of the Namgung Clan
posts.postContent: "The Heir to the Namgung Clan is a Rogue?!" Namgung Cheon, the head of the prestigious Namgung Clan, discovers the existence of his long-lost son and assigns a bodyguard to bring him home. Unbi, suddenly confronted with the revelation that his biological father is none other than the head of the Namgung Clan, agrees to go with them after being promised the chance to grow stronger. Upon arriving at the Namgung estate, Unbi finds himself in a rivalry with his half-brother, Namgung Yeomwoo, for the position of the heir.m"The sword techniques of the Namgung Clan? Who needs those? A real man fights with his fists!" armed with nothing but his fists, Unbi embarks on heir training, facing off against powerful opponents he never encountered during his days as a rogue. A thrilling new adventure begins!
posts.alternativeTitles: The NamGung Prince Is a Good-For-Nothing Young Master, Gangster Lord of NamGung Clan, 南宮世家の暴れん坊公子, 남궁세가 건달공자
posts.author: tba

posts.postContent:
"Don't underestimate a guard! You might end up dead!"

It’s been four long years since Yunbi was tricked by his master into becoming a disciple of Kwon Dalmun. Training in the unconventional **"Geonwoo Divine Art"**, which requires physical impact to channel inner energy to the dantian, Yunbi has grown tired of the absurd methods—falling off cliffs and crashing into trees to build up his strength.

After finally inheriting all of his master's inner energy, Yunbi returns home, only to be pressured by his mother into taking a job as a gatekeeper (known as a **"Wisa"**) at the Martial Alliance’s main gate.

Despite being mocked by martial artists and frequently provoked into fights, something strange happens—every hit he takes channels energy into his dantian, gradually increasing his internal strength!

To make matters worse, the peculiar moans Yunbi unconsciously lets out when struck only fuel misunderstandings across the martial world. 

Will Yunbi survive the chaos and manage to keep his job as a **Wisa**? Or will the absurdity of his situation lead to even more unexpected twists?

[Original Web Manhwa](https://www.mrblue.com/comic/C000055958)

**Original Webtoon:**  
[MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000057506), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9769720), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61980928)

**Official Translations:**  
[Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/161436)
posts.alternativeTitles: 無敵衛士, 衛士無敵, 위사무적, The Guardian Without Rival
posts.author: tba

posts.postContent:
In the chaotic martial arts world, powerful relics known as "Artifacts" contain the immense powers of ancient heroes, granting their wielders the ability to use these powers freely. To prevent disorder and maintain peace, the Martial Alliance establishes an organization called the "Crown" to retrieve these artifacts. However, the Crown's leader secretly seeks to use the artifacts' power to dominate the martial arts world. The protagonist, Gongson Rang, rises to stop the Crown's leader and strives to bring true peace to the martial arts community.

**Key Quote:**  
"Those who hold the Artifact shall hold the martial arts world."

**Original Webtoon:**  
[Mootoon](https://www.mootoon.co.kr/comic/moo_list.mg?tcode=quwo), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9266938), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59655708)
posts.alternativeTitles: 수라재천, 蒐羅齎天, Gathering to Present the Sky
posts.author: tba

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Guardian Who Devours Gods and Demons
posts.postContent: He accidentally entered the forbidden area and gained the ability to “devour the wasteland”! How will he who would become a “monster” fulfill his childhood sweetheart’s last wish? With the “curse” of the devil, the bloody adventure of the mysterious continent begins…\r\n\r\n[Original Webtoon](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/15790)
posts.alternativeTitles: I Evolved After Devouring the Demon God, Tūn Xià Móshén Hòu Wǒ Kāishǐ Jìnhuà, 神魔を喰らう最強守護者, 吞下魔神后我开始进化
posts.author: Yoolook Culture (有鹿文化)

posts.postContent:
Seonho Kim, an ordinary businessman, drinks a legendary liquor called "Palgwaeju" and acquires a martial art that dramatically increases his physical abilities.

He goes on a journey to find the rest of the "Palgwaeju" scattered around the earth.

**Original Webtoon:**

[Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10640936), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/63018550), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000064080), [Bufftoon](https://bufftoon.plaync.com/series/1010896)
posts.alternativeTitles: Master Drunkard, 두주불사
posts.author: tba

posts.postContent: Fernan Fellinberg is the heir of the richest family in the entire Empire. On what seemed to be another uneventful day, misfortune struck: Someone's spirit tried to take over his body! While Fernan managed to keep his soul intact, written prophecies kept flashing in his mind. However, something feels off... "What the...? Surely there's no way I'd end up in the streets, right?!" To Fernan, money is all he wants and all he has. Rather than just letting fate take his fortune away, Fernan sets off to change his prophesied future. If poverty was his destiny, he might as well spend his fortune to change that outcome.
posts.alternativeTitles: 교과서 대신 예언서 읽습니다
posts.author: Milib

posts.postContent: Planet 'Blood Cell' - a world created by the God of Death. Though populated by diverse plants, animals, and humans, this deity who revels in conflict designed it with one cruel rule: survival is only possible through blood consumption. For a millennium, this system bred endless conflict between beings desperate to survive. But now, after 1000 years, champions arise who will finally end this blood-soaked world ruled by greed!
posts.alternativeTitles: ノヴァコミックス
posts.author: Seo Mizuno, Hideto Nichiho

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Tamer Returned from Another World with his Childhood Friend as his Familiar
posts.postContent:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
posts.alternativeTitles: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi, 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染
posts.author: Skyfarm, Meidoin Heaven

posts.postContent: Ryuuki has been betrayed by the people he trusted and has fallen to the lowest ranks of society. Hoping for his luck to turn for the better, he spends his days playing at the “Randombox”. His aim is the SSR-rank reward, the right to make an account for the game “Labyrinth”! Sadly, not only did he actually manage to pull his greatest wish, but that too got stolen from him. However, that’s when Ryuuchi’s true luck started! “As long as you can pull it, you will be able to use The System and defy all logic”. Everything stolen from me… But I will take it all back through Gacha!!
posts.alternativeTitles: 日本語 (にほんご／にっぽんご)
posts.author: J-yul, CHOGA

posts.postContent:
Our protagonist, who cleared the extremely difficult of Vanta Black Ring a thousand times, awoke in the body of Ordinary Villager A (Hans) in Aram Village, in the tutorial area.

Monsters were attacking the village! In the midst of life and death, he couldn't help but think of the hero named Cadis and how he'd show up and defeat the monsters - until that very hero died with a single attack. Just when he thought everything was over, he absorbed the hero's abilities!

What happened to the protagonist who wanted to survive comfortably beside the hero, exactly?
posts.alternativeTitles: 우리 용사는 뭐함?, Uli Yongsaneun Mwoham?
posts.author: Kim Danpung

posts.postContent:
The protagonist, wandering the martial world with a secret of the red dot, has a fateful encounter with a legendary figure and joins the Beggars' Sect.
The master who imparted absolute martial arts to the protagonist meets a mysterious death.
With the death of the master, who was the pillar of the beggars, the Beggars' Sect gradually declines.
In response, the protagonist decides to leave the sect, investigate the master's death, and create a new Beggars' Sect that will not be looked down upon.
posts.alternativeTitles: 신개방문
posts.author: 구운몽

posts.postContent: What would you do if you suddenly regained memories of your past life and realized you were living in a world that was once a game you played? Jinfrey chooses to use his knowledge as an OG gamer and exploit the game’s secrets so he can become an unparalleled adventurer. But he’ll have to be careful because if he dies, it’s game over! Will he be able to find all of the hidden rank equipment, defeat the bosses, and give his family the life they deserve?
posts.alternativeTitles: ？？？ランクの裏装備無双 ,  ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
posts.author: Kiyoro

posts.postContent: Reincarnated as a nameless commoner on Raniakea, the continent of magic and steel, with memories of 21st century Earth. To escape the life of a commoner, who is almost like a slave, he must lift the 'Magic Stone' and become a Giant Rider.\r\n\r\n‘Straighten your back!’ ‘Tighten your belly!’ ‘Take a deep breath into the bottom of your abdomen!’. He uses knowledge from his previous life as a trainer to accumulate magical power as if he were exercising, and climbs the ladder of the social hierarchy.
posts.alternativeTitles: 1RM의 기간트 라이더, 1RM's Gigant Rider
posts.author: 9℃, Oneuldoyo

posts.postTitle: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
posts.postContent:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China!

nHowever, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef!

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
posts.alternativeTitles: 요리사가 되고 싶은 천마님
posts.author: Jeomdori, Chunsam

posts.postTitle: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World
posts.postContent:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?
posts.alternativeTitles: 짜장 한 그릇에 제갈세가 데릴사위, A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family
posts.author: Ereuhut, Huh Il

posts.postTitle: Legacy of the Skipped Hero: Second-Class Ascendant
posts.postContent:
Douji, a renowned marksman specialist and the top strategist in gaming, known for skipping through content at double speed and ignoring anything not summarized in three lines, decides to take on the challenge of Ferrerus, which is a game of "Land of Hardship" in the gaming world.

Despite his usual nonchalant approach, Douji finds himself forcefully transitioned into the hidden class of "Skip Warrior" within the perilous depths of Ferrerus, where even gamers who can't spare a moment for footnotes tremble.

With this melee-oriented hidden class, can Douji reclaim his former glory and ascend once more to the top rank?
posts.alternativeTitles: 2차전직 스킵용사, 2nd Job Transfer Skip Warrior
posts.author: Kim Jang-Hoon, Park Soo-Bong

posts.postContent: Baek Un-ho, a third-generation disciple from a respectable family but lacking inner strength, may be expelled from the Mount Hua sect. However, one day he stumbles upon a fateful encounter with Mong Won-kyung and emerges as an unparalleled prodigy of the Mount Hua sect. Just how powerful will Baek Un-ho become?!
posts.alternativeTitles: Huashan Sect's Greatest Genius of All Time,  화산파 역대급 천재
posts.author: Jeong Hwak-Kon, Kkullasyong

posts.postContent:
Masks are art, dance is martial arts!
The despised mask dancer 'Bongsan' follows the map left by his master
To stop the monster tiger 'Saphung Black Tiger' who wants to become king
He sets out on an adventure to find the legendary 'Human Mask'...
posts.alternativeTitles: Máscara humana, 사람의 탈
posts.author: Ujudol

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Chef in Another World
posts.postContent:
Kang Taeyang, a chef who chased his dreams. One day, he lost everything due to a single choice. But an opportunity came to Taeyang, who was spending hopeless days working odd jobs.

[Aurora is hiring employees.]

A single line of text changed everything for him!
posts.alternativeTitles: 이세계 강셰프, Otherworldly Chef Kang
posts.author: Yangpyeong (양평), Banabada, Lee Jinsu(이진수)

posts.postTitle: The Only New Game+ Hardcore Gamer ~I'm So Overpowered, I Shattered the Game's Balance~
posts.postContent:
Rise to the top with knowledge and skills in your second life!

Former pro gamer Itsuki, who concealed his controversial past and worked as a VTuber, is attacked by problematic fans after getting doxxed, resulting in an accident that makes him lose consciousness. He wakes up only to find himself 10 years in the past, right after the launch of the hugely popular VRMMO Metasense!

There’s no need to hide his past in this world. Equipped with knowledge and skills from his first playthrough, becoming a top gamer and streamer is effortless!

I… will stand at the pinnacle of Metasense!
posts.alternativeTitles: Ore Dake 2-Shuume Gachizei - Tsuyo Sugite Game Balance wo Hakai Shita, 俺だけ2周目ガチ勢～強すぎてゲームバランスを破壊した～
posts.author: Roribasu, Hoshi Nasubi, Sato (さと), Shin'ishi Satoshifu

posts.postTitle: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter
posts.postContent: Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.\r\nThis is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!
posts.alternativeTitles: Demon Daddy Warrior Daughter,  마왕 아빠 용사 딸
posts.author: Choi Geo Bong, Ppangbagsa, Jumog

posts.postContent: A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!\r\nNovice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.\r\nA fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!
posts.alternativeTitles: 魔法使いのお食事処, Mahoutsukai no Oshokujidokoro
posts.author: SENZAKI Mayo, Gempak Starz

posts.postContent:
If you make the wrong choice, you will die instantly! The worst Otome game ever with death is about to begin!

One day, the protagonist receives an email from her former best friend saying, “I finished developing the game we used to make together, and I’d like for you to play it.” However, the day after playing the game, she wakes up and finds herself as “Diana,” the villainess of the game! Moreover, she has entered the “extra mode,” in which Diana is the heroine! In this mode, her favorability with the male characters starts in the negatives, all of them seem to resent Diana.

Can Diana survive this game of death?
posts.alternativeTitles: Seizonritsu 0% no Akuyaku Reijou, 生存率0%の悪役令嬢
posts.author: Akiko Kaiho

posts.postContent:
Aside from the good looks...
Kim Joon-young, an academy instructor who has nothing to put forward in terms of academic background or teaching ability.
After meeting an old man, everything changes.

National middle and high school performance evaluation of all subjects,
Midterm and final exams, as well as the SAT.
Get a USB with all future releases.
posts.alternativeTitles: 미래 USB로 인생역전!
posts.author: Keopikong, Solage, Park Myungwoon, Jeonjigu

posts.postTitle: Surviving in a School Bully Webtoon
posts.postContent:
The author of the number one-ranked school bully webtoon, Noh Cheolmin, has been trapped in the world he created! And as the world’s weakest character!

His assistant, who ran away halfway into production, is in the body of the world’s strongest, the ‘Protagonist’?!

Can this chaotic duo, an author with a broken personality and his runaway assistant, survive in the harsh world of A School Bully Webtoon?
posts.alternativeTitles: 일진만화에서 살아남기, School Gangster Comic Survival
posts.author: Hyeonsil Anjuhyeong

posts.postContent: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!
posts.alternativeTitles: 만능사원 전설이 되다
posts.author: JRobin, BONGUN, Mr. Capman

posts.postContent: A man who was reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
posts.alternativeTitles: 어느 마법사의 식당, The Wizard's Restaurant
posts.author: chassi, Bad Boys, 스튜디오 이너스

posts.postContent:
"There can only be one sun."
"Two suns will only burn and kill the empire's people."

Alexar, the great wizard who commanded the empire, after being betrayed by his close friend Gillian Terzios who he trusted and followed, was reborn again as a master swordsman on the outskirts of a small country.

Alexar, the great wizard, moves to seek revenge on Gillian, his close friend and the only nine-star prosecutor of the continent.
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Yuhwang (유황), PantherPenguin

posts.postTitle: The Reincarnated Magician with Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~
posts.postContent: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!
posts.alternativeTitles: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku, 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~
posts.author: Kankitsu Yusura, Miyuki Ruria

posts.postTitle: To Another World on My Own!
posts.postContent: Tarou Satu, a young man who longed for an otherworldly adventure since a child and devoted his youth to finding it, finally goes to another world on his own. However, things did not go well for him, as his previous life’s memories were about to be erased by God. Despite that, he almost dies during his reincarnation process, which allows him to fulfil the condition for a special ability and luckily, keep his old memories. From there, the now reincarnated Tauro Satu, grows up by using his brains and efforts while gradually developing his mysterious skill, Garbled Text, which everyone thought to be completely useless.
posts.alternativeTitles: Jiriki de Isekai e!, 自力で異世界へ!
posts.author: Nishi no Hate no Pero.

posts.postContent:
Being poor has become a sin.

The once righteous International police has now sided with the wealthy. The world has now changed into a place where money is everything.

A girl from a slum, who has spent her entire life hiding her power, faced a tragedy because of the atrocities of a devilish building owner. With nothing but a burning desire for revenge, the girl who no longer wanted to be a slave to this filthy world anymore, makes her way to the Central City checkpoint.

And there, she meets a “Santa”, a mysterious courier of presents…

Despair, sorrow, and the wishes of those who had died, the revenge play of a hero who clenched her every desire and dreams tightly within her fist.
posts.alternativeTitles: 산타 인더스트리 • Santa Industry
posts.author: Ppuek-i

posts.postTitle: The Strongest Hero's Party Wants to Know Love
posts.postContent:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!

The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.
posts.alternativeTitles: 最強勇者パーティーは愛が知りたい , Saikyou Yuusha Party wa Ai ga Shiritai
posts.author: Yamada Henjuban

chapters.title: It’s Still Too Early for a Proposal

posts.postTitle: The Peerless Mature Hitman Wants to Live Quietly With His Daughters
posts.postContent:
Harland Defense is an older man. He holds the title of the world’s one and only Risk Rarity 8 individual, and that’s not all: he’s also a peerless hit man who possesses extraordinary strength. He is employed by national governments and the big shots who run the world, and as soon as he receives his weapon from a girl known as “Mourning Dress,” he completes every job with the utmost degree of care and perfection.

All he wants is to create a world free of crime.

However, the so-called strongest hit man had one small weakness… There’s a group of peaceful girls with unfortunate circumstances living in the apartment building that Harland manages? A peerless older man with two sides: his ordinary life together with beautiful girls who have troubled pasts, and his life as a hit man! Presenting a brand-new colored comic series by Kazuma Kamachi, the author of “A Certain Magical Index” and “A Certain Scientific Railgun”!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative raw](https://hykecomic.com/sample/%E7%84%A1%E5%8F%8C%E3%81%AE%E7%86%9F%E5%B9%B4%E3%83%92%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%83%9E%E3%83%B3%E3%81%AF%E3%80%81%E5%A8%98%E3%81%9F%E3%81%A1%E3%81%A8%E9%9D%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AB%E6%9A%AE%E3%82%89%E3%81%97)
posts.alternativeTitles: 無双の熟年ヒットマンは 娘たちと静かに暮らしたい
posts.author: Kamachi Kazuma, hagihara

posts.postTitle: Reincarnated With a Metal Bat ~Surviving the Monochrome Madness~
posts.postContent: The man who can take a full swing into another person’s head… [Fighting Yankee — Imaoka] was reincarnated into another world. There are people who can control lightning to their world, produce infinite amount of magma… people who are full of superpowers known as [Gift]. In midst of all of that, the Gift that Imaoka received was obviously the Metal bat. In the world of [Monochrome], the world of madness where people live in accordance to their desires. Imaoka destroys every single one of the outlaws within the 1 meter range of his metal bat.
posts.alternativeTitles: 俺だけ金属バット〜モノクロームの世界〜, Ore Dake Kinzoku Bat - Monochrome no Sekai
posts.author: Okan

posts.postTitle: Master of the Martial Arts Library
posts.postContent: Ha So-chan, the bastard of the Ha family, lived a life full of despair. Even though he dedicated his life to training, the only thing he received was laughter and a destroyed dantian. Then came the miracle: ‘Congratulations on becoming the master of the martial arts library.’ “The world will remember my name.” Thus, begins the story of the greatest teacher and the greatest swordsman, who is destined to conquer all.
posts.alternativeTitles: Lord of the Martial Arts Library, 무공서고의 주인, 武功書庫の主
posts.author: Midsummer, Sanghyun, Lim JaeYong (임재용)

posts.postTitle: Chronicles of the Jobless Hero: Ousted From the Duke's Manor, but With Skills Gained Through Punches, I Emerge as the Continent's Ultimate Hero
posts.postContent:
In a world where Classes are bestowed by the gods upon everyone when they reach eighteen, the existence of Skills within these Classes tends to overshadow any hard work, setting one's life path. Within this imbalanced system, Lythe, who trained in hopes of becoming a Holy Knight, was heartlessly classified as Jobless during the Class assignment, resulting in his expulsion from the town by his father, the Duke. As he scraped by as a luggage boy, there came a day when the merchant caravan he was with got attacked by bandits. Lythe, attempting to save the child, engaged in a battle with the skillful attackers, accepting his impending death. Yet, a mysterious voice echoed in his head when he punched a bandit in his last act of defiance...
___
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9583gj/)  (jp)
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58563)
posts.alternativeTitles: クラス≪無職≫の英雄譚～公爵家を追放されたが、実は殴っただけでスキルを獲得できるとわかり、大陸一の英雄に上り詰める～, Kurasu ≪Mushoku≫ no Eiyuu-tan ~Koushaku-ka o Tsuihou Sareta ga, Jitsu wa Nagutta Dake de Sukiru o Kakutoku Dekiru to Wakari, Tairiku Ichi no Eiyuu ni Noboritsumeru~
posts.author: Amekawa Riuchi, Salah-D

posts.postContent: In an age of evil where all humans are being hunted by Spirits, chaos broke out after a Monster destroyed an entire city, thus igniting a battle between gods and demons. But among so much darkness there will always be light, and this will come from the hands of Ding Xiao who will seek to fight against these evil spirits, thus becoming the greatest spiritual master, although the question is: will he be the one to Ascend to touch the sky? Or will he be tempted to turn Evil?
posts.alternativeTitles: 天相, The Worthy One to the Heaven, Celestial Phase
posts.author: Feng Qi ManYou, YouShi Wenhua

posts.postContent: A child born to become a shaman and disrupt the world. He tries to become an ordinary office worker in order not to give up his greed and receive God.Choi Young-hoon, who sees through fate through contemplation and spurs. Can you really become an ordinary office worker?
posts.alternativeTitles: 운명을 보는 회사원
posts.author: Yeong Wan, Im Seongwook

posts.postTitle: Rebirth of the Strongest Sword God
posts.postContent: The top player of the popular MMO, “Divine Realm”, Shi Feng, was betrayed by his club. He drank in sadness, but then woke up realizing he had gone back 10 years, to the time when Divine Realm had just released. Using the ten years of experience he had, he started all over to climb back to the top. This time, he intends to surpass himself and reach greater heights.
posts.alternativeTitles: 重生之最强剑神, Reincarnation of the Strongest Sword God
posts.author: Yu Cheng, Yuewen Manhua (阅文漫画)

posts.postContent: “Who needs a bandit, anyway?” That’s the last thing Ikoma Ichinose, a bandit-class hunter, heard before he got kicked out of his party and ran into a monster that would kill him. But he was given a second chance at life in the form of a time-turning pocket watch. “Yeah, who needs a bandit?” This time, Ikoma chooses to be a gravity master to have a shot at becoming the greatest hunter of all time.
posts.alternativeTitles: Reborn Ranker - Gravity User,  冒険者は隠しクラス〈重力使い〉で最強を目指す
posts.author: Nekoko., Chikuwa

posts.postContent:
“When you step into the jianghu, the world will become your enemy…”
The young head of a declining noble family, Baek Mujin, prepares for a journey beyond the confines of his home to restore his family’s fortune. Despite the foreseen future that the world will stand against him, Mujin begins a solitary battle.

Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…

The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

From the artist of Beast Familiar For All: Beginning Awakening of Mythical Talents

Title: Solo School, Love in Session

'Solo School', a teenage dating entertainment program that takes place at a virtual school located on Jeju Island during the summer vacation month.
Woo-ri Chae, an ordinary high school student who was living her daily life as usual.
She impulsively appears in 'Solo School' following her boyfriend, whom she has secretly had a crush on for 8 years.
Indeed... will we be able to find our first love here? Woo-ri Chae, a solo artist from birth, has an eventful Yeon-fee challenge!♥

By the same Author of: My Dud to Stud Boyfriend
posts.alternativeTitles: 솔로스쿨, Escuela en solitario, Sekolah Tunggal, Soloschule, Yalnız Okul, École solo, Соло школа, مدرسة منفردة, โรงเรียนเดี่ยว, ソロスクール, 独奏学校, 獨奏學校, Love in Session
posts.author: YERANG

posts.postTitle: I Was Possessed By The Mad Ladys Body That I Served
posts.postContent:
The Mad Heiress vs. the Monstrous Earl

Bella, a long-suffering maid in the Duke’s household, spent her days enduring cruelty and abuse. One fateful day, a mysterious figure shoved her from the rooftop, sending her plummeting to her death.

But death wasn’t the end. Bella wakes up in the body of the Duke’s infamous "mad" daughter, a young woman bedridden and shrouded in scandal for years.

Armed with a new identity and a thirst for justice, Bella is determined to uncover the truth behind her murder and deliver vengeance to those who made her life a living hell.
posts.alternativeTitles: 주인으로 모시던 미치광이 귀족 영애의 몸에 빙의하다
posts.author: EON COMICS

posts.postContent:
I thought I had life all figured out. A quiet, uneventful existence as the daughter of a humble woodcutter—nothing more, nothing less. Living in a world consumed by war, where chaos reigned 365 days a year, the simplicity of an extra’s life was the greatest blessing I could ask for.

Our tiny mountain village was my haven. My father, James Brown, was the epitome of ordinariness—a 27-year-old single dad with plain brown hair, matching brown eyes, and an unassuming demeanor. He was the perfect symbol of the background character trope.

Or so I thought.

“Ladies and gentlemen!” I declared with pride. “May I present my father! The quintessential extra! Brown hair, brown eyes, chopping wood like the unremarkable man he is!”

The knight commander in front of me said nothing, his expression unreadable.

“…Right? He is just an ordinary guy, right?” I asked, my voice faltering.

The silence hung in the air like an executioner’s blade. Then, out of nowhere, the staff in my father’s hands began to glow—a strange, mesmerizing blue light emanating from its worn surface.

“…Dad?” I whispered, my heart pounding.

To my utter disbelief, my father’s plain brown hair began to shimmer, transforming before my eyes. His dull brown eyes brightened into piercing blue orbs that seemed to hold the very essence of power. His once unremarkable appearance morphed into something straight out of a legend—his silver hair gleaming like the moonlight.

“What the hell is going on?!” I screamed as the life I knew crumbled into dust.

And then, gripping his now-radiant staff with the confidence of a man who had nothing to fear, my father—no, this mysterious warrior—snarled with a voice that chilled me to my core:

“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”

My unassuming, extra life was shattered in an instant.
posts.alternativeTitles: 아빠가 힘을 숨김
posts.author: KO Eun Chae, Meong Yi

posts.postContent:
Deemed intellectually disabled from birth, Huang Ji, a backwoods country kid, somehow achieves complete omniscience. He feels the universe’s malice, sensing humanity’s dire predicament everywhere— Humans were unknowingly being controlled by aliens, secretly trafficked by fellow “human collaborators” worshipping their extraterrestrial overlords, all while the apocalypse looms!

As the one, true all-knowing being, Huang Ji decides to take on the monumental task of saving humanity, vowing to carve a place for mankind within this Cosmic Alliance!

posts.postTitle: This Man Is Really a Dog
posts.postContent: The love story between Song Haohao and the CEO who can transform into a Doberman.
posts.alternativeTitles: 这个男人是真的狗, Zhege Nanren Shi Zhen De Gou, The Man Is a Real Dog
posts.author: 彩笺

posts.postContent:
Yejoon, who was once Inha's constant point of comparison.  
Tired of being endlessly compared, Inha finds unexpected recognition after receiving an art award by chance. This leads him to pursue the path of art.  
Eight years later, Inha reunites with Yejoon… only to discover that Yejoon is also now involved in art.  
Believing that Yejoon will inevitably become a rival once again, just like in the past, Inha devises a plan to distance himself from Yejoon.  
This is a story of Inha’s growth and romance as he claims to hate Yejoon.
posts.alternativeTitles: 내가 싫어하는 남자친구
posts.author: 하늘 (Haneul)

posts.postTitle: I'm No Saint, So I'll Become the Demon Lord!
posts.postContent:
Title: I'm No Saint, So I'll Become the Demon Lord!

Title: I Don't Have The Qualities to be a Saint, So I Decided to Aim to be The Last Boss!

Rina Amakusa, worn out from working at a toxic company, finds herself guided by a mysterious voice and suddenly transported into the world of a game she once loved, taking on the role of a saintess. She tirelessly repeats loops, striving to save the world, but her life takes a dark turn when she is betrayed and killed by her favorite character. Her love for him twists into hatred, and that transformation shifts her from saintess to final boss. Thus begins a tale of revenge in an otherworldly fantasy setting!
posts.alternativeTitles: 聖女の素質がないので、ラスボスを目指すことにしました, I Don't Have The Qualities to be a Saint, So I Decided to Aim to be The Last Boss!
posts.author: Tensui Mato

posts.postContent: When I opened my eyes, I was in the world of a novel. In order to avoid the fate of a cannon fodder villainess who would end up disappearing early on, I became close friends with the female lead and guided her towards romance with the male lead. But... Female lead: Evelyn's going to be with me today. Male lead: What? I can't let that happen. Excuse me... Why are you two fighting over me? The sickly male lead, who came to our house in order to recuperate, has no plans of leaving. 'You have to become healthy so you can return to the capital.' 'There's no rush.' I wanted to act as the bridge between the two before exiting comfortably, but something's clearly gone wrong. --- Evelyn Monstera knows two things. First, she's been reborn as a mean girl in a fantasy novel, and second, if nothing changes, her cruelty to the main characters will be her undoing. So when the male lead of the novel, Casis Urquio, comes to stay at her manor, all she has to do is stay out of his way. Unfortunately, Evelyn not only causes a fight between the protagonists, but also wins the affection of the male lead too! Can Evelyn set the story straight and get the happily ever after she wants?
posts.alternativeTitles: 한국어 (韓國語), 조선말 (朝鮮語)
posts.author: Senri, Shadu

posts.postTitle: A Boy Raised by the Ultimate Dragon Wants to Be Fostered by Someone Stronger Than His Parent!
posts.postContent:
In this world, humans and dragons exist, often clashing and dueling each another. At some point, children were even offered as sacrifices, including a child named Norn, who was picked up and raised under the world's strongest dragons. His non-stop training with his Dad and Mom started soon after.

“ So humans… are stronger than Dad? ” 

This boy, who inherited both a strong sense of justice and the overwhelming strength of dragons, was destined to bring peace to the long-standing war between the races… or that's what was supposed to happen. However, the excessively harsh training environment completely broke Norn’s self-confidence, and he started seeking a human stronger than his parents willing to take care of him. 

...Yes, he aimed for a spoiled life under someone else's care!

Thus begins the grand tale of a timid boy oblivious to his unmatched powers in this amazing dragon-magic fantasy!
posts.alternativeTitles: 最強竜に育てられた少年は、親より強い奴に養われたい！
posts.author: KENKYONA Saukuru, NOZAWA Tomonobu
posts.artist: Azusha, KOTOBUKINO Hara, Pine Village Ltd., SAKAI Mitaru

posts.postContent:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”

Qi Xing, your average high schooler, stumbles across a mysterious seven-star disc. But this ain’t no ordinary frisbee. Suddenly, the disc drags him into the “Disc World”— a mind-blowing realm where his crazy adventure kicks off.

Through a twist of fate, Qi Xing becomes a cultivator, a master of countless Daoist techniques.

As he unlocks the secrets of the Seven Star Disc, a hidden power within him— the Primordial Celestial Qi—begins to awaken. But with every revelation, he gets sucked deeper into a conspiracy surrounding the legendary “Path of Immortality” through which he uncovers the truth about achieving immortality in the World within the Disc…

chapters.title: Tales of the Stellar Unknown Chapter 02
Tales of the Stellar Unknown Chapter 01

posts.postContent:
Lee Hyun-woo finds himself possessed by Kyle Seltarion, an extra character in the game where he once reigned as the world’s top-ranked player. Considering the game’s storyline, he faces a situation where Kyle’s death is imminent.

What’s worse, he’s now in the body of a character who can’t use magic or aura, has a terminal illness, and has such a nasty personality that his reputation is at rock bottom!

However, upon discovering a new talent, he awakens his mana and begins to improve his condition and reputation using the hidden route knowledge he gained through grinding in the game. His immediate goal is to save his own life, but that goal is closely tied to preventing the world’s destruction…

To overcome this situation, he needs to gather allies and build his reputation! Let’s leave behind the past as a scoundrel and move toward a new chapter!
posts.author: Keyboard Manse, Ki Sung-Wook , Nam Sa-Rang

chapters.title: The Marquis’s Family Magical Genius Chapter 30
The Marquis’s Family Magical Genius Chapter 29

posts.postTitle: Akari The Final Boss Girl ~ I’m Going To The Modern Age To Find Someone Stronger Than Me~
posts.postContent:
In a certain parallel world the demon king Avalon reigns over the last dungeon. No one could defeat him, so for ten thousand years he had been unable to fulfill his life’s purpose. Out of boredom and resignation, Avalon reincarnated into another world in search of someone who can defeat him, but what awaited him there is the body of Akari, a high school girl who was bullied to death.

A dozen years ago, gates suddenly opened on Earth, and monsters from dungeons invaded. Akari, who attended a school that trained “Hunters,” was bullied for being ranked E, the lowest rank in history.

Hoping to find someone stronger than himself, Avalon decides to attend the school as Akari, but those around her don’t realize that she has been replaced by the strongest last boss, and they start bullying her….!?

posts.postTitle: My Wife Is a Heavenly Big Shot
posts.postContent:
Game starts, and BAM!! I’ve got a wife who’s basically the final boss of power levels! Who needs to grind when you can live off the queen? Problem is, the moment I said, “Honey, it’s really me, your hubby,” this supposed wife of mine nearly choked the life outta me… Wait a minute, I think I grabbed the wrong script for this life!

Winner Of The 2024 Series Picking Poll

After the cataclysmic fall of his homeland, Dante, a hardened demon hunter, finds himself driven by two things: cold, hard cash… and ice-cold revenge.

He joins forces with his old comrade, Valkyrie, forming an unlikely alliance to tackle the most dangerous and lucrative missions this strange new world has to offer.

Together, they must unravel bizarre and deadly supernatural mysteries, all while navigating a chaotic landscape where supernatural powers reign supreme. They’ll face down fanatical cults, monstrous creatures, and something far more insidious…

In this world, the line between sanity and power blurs. The closer one dances with madness, the greater their strength becomes! Those who dare to embrace the abyss are favored by the insidious Evil God—the one true deity—the only deity that exists in this world—but at a terrible cost. For the power they crave is a double-edged sword, threatening to consume them in the very insanity they seek…
Bored with his mastery over cultivation, a powerful master embarks on a thrilling journey to a new world, only to stumble upon a shocking discovery...
posts.author: The Collection Department Part

chapters.title: Cultivator’s Ascent: A Solitary Journey Chapter 12
Cultivator’s Ascent: A Solitary Journey Chapter 11

posts.postContent:
‘You crazy bastards, leave me alone.’
The story of Do Yugang, the son of the Heavenly Demon, who is anxious because he doesn’t want to become the Demonic Sect Leader
